mchog bcu rnyed do/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas nas tsan+dan gyis btags pa'i pad+ma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /yul gyi bdag po nyid so sor rnyed do/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas bdag pa bsregs te tsam pa ka'i

me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste gser stong so sor rnyed do/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas te me tog gi ge sar stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste gos stong so sor rnyed do/ /de bzhin du me tog thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i cho ga'o/ /dur khrod nas

ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs te zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ming med kyi sor mo'i khrag gis zlum po byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong zlos shig /rigs brgyud dang bcas pa dbang du byed do/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang

gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas 'bras yos la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /gi wang la stong du mngon par bsngags pas thig le byas na gang mthong ba dang / gang rnams mthong ba de rnams dbang du byed do/ /tho

rangs tu ruSh+ka'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te gdong bkrus pas gang mthong ba de sbyin par byed do/ /thams cad de kho na bzhin du til mar za bas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te 'thungs shig /don du ma gnyer bar bza' ba rnyed

do/ /rgyal po'i pho brang du rab tu zhugs te chos gos de blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te lag pa g.yon pas mdud pa byas na thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun gyi nang du dran par byed cing bzlas pas 'ching ba grol bar byed do/ /gcod pa dang / 'bugs

pa lag pa'i sngags rnams la pa lA'i 'bru dang / ka ra bI ra dkar po dang / yungs kar rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar lag pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad zlos shig /sngags rnams slong bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /rims gzhom par 'dod pas

gi ri kaR+Ni ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig shI rims 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /seng ldeng gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /gdon thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/ /thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas gzhan gyi

gsang sngags sgrub par byed do/ /chu la lan cig bzlas pas grol lo/ /ras sam gro ga la bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na pha rol gyi dmag sde rengs par 'gyur ro/ /chu dang phye za zhing nag po'i brgyad pa'am/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum

du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan mo gcig par song nas lus kyi g.yas su ras ris bzhugs te bcing bar bya'o/ /khu tshur bcings nas ji srid khu ba byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /'ching bar byed do/ /zhes gsum pa la khu tshur sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /khu tshur

byas na mi snang ngo / /lo bdun brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po yang ci bgyir 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gzugs brnyan byas te cho ga bzhin du mngon par mchod nas bal

ba'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung ngo / /de nas grub par 'gyur ba ste rdzas sam gser dpag tu med pa rnyed do/ /nyin mtshan du smyung

bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ka ra bI ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /de nas ka ra bI ra'i me tog cig blangs nas klu'i gnas su song ste me tog klu mtsho bran du bcug la sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /klu ma dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /

gang don du gnyer ba de thob par byed do/ /nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la lam sum mdor mchod pa byas nas nye bar 'dug ste sran ma'i tshad kyis ldong ros kyi ril bu byas nas khar bcug ste ji srid kha gas pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /ldong ros

grub par 'gyur te dpral bar thig le byas pas mi snang ngo / /'dod pa'i gzugs can lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar byed do/ /nag po'i brgyad pa la khri'i tshogs can blangs nas gzhan mo'i brgyad pa la khro tshogs can la rtse gsum byed du gzhug go/ /gzhan pa'i nag

po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dur khrod du song nas rtse gsum la mchod pa chen po byas nas skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pas rtse gsum blangs nas ji srid rtse gsum las 'od zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas grub

par 'gyur te mtshan mo ma brtsigs pa ru lha'i khyim 'byung ste rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i bud med 'byung ngo / /'khor gyi skyes bu mang po yang dgod pa dang sgeg pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kun khyab par nye bar gnas te gang bsams pa de thams cad rnyed do/ /tho

rangs ston pas thams cad 'jog go/ /dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar tshangs ma'i khu ba zho gang la brgyad brgyar zlos la 'thungs shig nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi spyan

sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i srung ba byas te bza' ba'i Ti kA la ji srid zan du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas grub par 'gyur te phyi nas zan 'pho bar byed do/ /'bru la skyes pa yang ngo / /sngon spyad pa byas pas lcags gsum las byung ba'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug

pa'i rnam pa byas nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'khor lo a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag ste skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas

blangs pa tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil ba nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te gang rnams kyis mthong ba de rnams dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar ba can legs par mthong ba blangs nas lag pas mnan te lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas

gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ku sha las byung ba'i 'khor lo byas nas lan bdun bzlas pa chur bcug ste klu rnams langs nas ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do/ /dong tse 'bum byin cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /slong mo za zhing ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te stong

phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de mthong nas 'grub par byed do/ /rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas arga'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig /nyi ma mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /chu klung de nyid du rked pa nub tsam

du zhugs nas bil ba'i me tog rab tu lhug cig /mes pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /man+dA ra ba'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig /dbang pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid chu la man+dA ra ba'i me tog gis nor sbyin mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag

gnyis bzlas par bya'o/ /rgyal por 'gyur bar byed do/ /'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do/ /rgyas tshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te mya ngan med pa'i shing gi me tog stong phrag brgya blug par bya'o/ /mtshan

mo bdun gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs par byed do/ /shing la mi smra bar zla ba drug tu bzlas par bya'o/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas so sor rnyed do/ /arga las byung ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan sor drug pa byas nas kha dog ma 'dres pas rgyan thams cad

kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /yang na rig pa 'dzin pa nyid do/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar zla ba drug tu lag pa g.yon pa la mngon par bsngags nas khri yongs su bzlas te nye bar gyur pa'i gter

'bum 'byung ngo / /'bras yos la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu dang / a bA marga'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg gyis shig /gser stong phrag bcu so sor rnyed do/ /gi wang blangs te ril

bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkri'o/ /de nas gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang bdug pa dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin te ril bu thod pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas/ ji srid

'jigs pa'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /'jigs par mi 'gyur grogs rnams la bgos nas yang khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /phag gi mig blangs nas phyugs dang lhan cig gzhon nu ma'i lag pas btab

par bya'o/ /ril bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkris te lag pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g.yas phyogs su kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste lag pa g.yas pas mnan pas ji srid shi ta'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /rig pa bzlas te grogs

rnams la'ang byin nas khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu dga' ba dang / lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar byed do/ /pad+ma ge sar dang / mig sman dang / ldong ros kyang rung ste/ cha mnyam par byas nas gso sbyong can gyi bu mo'i lag pas btab

par bya'o/ /lcags gsum gyis dkris pa byas nas sngon spyad pa byas pa rgyal po'i sbyor bas dbang phyug chen po'i sku'i g.yas su 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phul nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas te kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag nas/ lag pa

g.yas pas mnan te ji srid kha Ta kha Ta zhes sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gcig phul nas grogs rnams la'ang bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do/ /sngon spyad pa byas pas 'o ma dang nas zan

za zhing ri'i rtse mor ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas gso sbyong can gyis grog mkhar gyi sa rtag tu blangs nas 'o mas sbyar te 'jam par byas nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshod kyi dad pa bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma

'dres pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su ras ris bzhugs nas dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod de 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin nas gos gtsang ma bgos pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid ngang pa g.yo bar byed

pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngar yongs su bzlas pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ /slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o/ /thams cad 'ong bar byed de 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /sngags bzlas pa'i

rma byas reg par bya'o/ /ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do/ /lus kyi nang du son par gyur cig cas brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po'i lus su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig de nyid la skra li zhing 'khyil pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa rnam pa nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba

thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do/ /gang mthong ba dang lta bar byed pa de dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas

pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya'o/ /gso sbyong can gyis mi smra bar thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas 'o mar nyin zhag bdun du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas phyung ste sa dkar po dang tsan+dan gyi chus mnyes pas ji srid rdo rje phog pa'i shing 'khrur

gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po gso sbyang can gyis bzo bos seng ge byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas rgyu skar snar ma la dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo bza' bar bya'o/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po

byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas lag pa g.yas pas seng ge mnan te ji srid seng ge g.yo bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /g.yos pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i

mtshan ma skye ste 'jigs par mi byed do/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i yungs kar rnams kyis seng ge la gzhu bar bya'o/ /seng ge sgra chen po sgrogs par byed do/ /sgrub pa po yang ma bsams par dgon pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

de nas sgrub pa pos lan bdun brjod nas seng ge la 'dzegs te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'dus nas seng ge la zhon te 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis rlung ltar 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor du ma dang / bskal par gnas shing

gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe gang du 'dod par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /seng ge'i sgrub thabs so/ /nor sgrub par byed par 'dod na dkar po'i zla ba nya nas brtsams te mi smra bar 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing ji snyed phyi ma zla ba gsum gyi bar du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par

bya'o/ /de nas ras ris g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan g.yo bar byed do/ /nor gyi dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro/ /nI lA Ta ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags te mdud pa bya'o/ /gyad g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /

thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor bzhag par byas na g.yul du rgyal bar 'gyur te gyad kyi dngos grub bo/ /dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas 'o ma dang lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas pa byas nas 'thungs shig /de bzhin du

nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas 'od zer byung ste sgrub pa pos bskor ba byas nas steng du 'gro ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can lo brgya stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed do/ /nag

po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig /bar gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du gi wang bzhag nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i tshe blang bar bya ste blangs pa tsam la sred med kyi bu'i stobs su 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams mthu med par 'gyur ro/ /gang phreng ba

dang ldan pa de gnas pas lo sum brgya 'cho bar byed do/ /nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du sbyang bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/ be kang+ka ta'i yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis

shig /dong tseg cig rnyed do/ /dkar po'i bcu gsum pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas sa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i lha byas nas de'i khar 'bras thug po che'i stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /nyi ma bdun la gang bu mo 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nag po'i bcu

bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas dur khrod du song ste/ sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byug pa byas nas ma nyams pa'i thod pa blangs te tsan+dan dmar po'i chus bkrus nas me tog dmar po dang / dri dang me tog gis mngon par mchod cing de

nas thod pa la nye bar 'dug ste/ gsang sngags bzlas pas dgug par bya'o/ /ji srid thod pa g.yo bar gyur pa de srid du'o/ /de'i tshe grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sen mos gang bkug pa de 'ong ste/ gang brjod pa de byed do/ /zhib byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi

spyan sngar pad+ma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar mA la ti'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon spyad pa byas pa nag po'i lnga pa la ring bsrel dang bcas

pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma rgya chen po dbul bar bya'o/ /phyi rol du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byan te/ de nas nA ga ge sar gyi phye mas gzugs brnyan bris shig /dkyil 'khor bcing ba yang byas nas ku sha'i

khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid du skar mda' ltung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /slar yang ji srid ras ris 'gul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /dngos grub kyi mtshan ma gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ste/ de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas

'phur ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can dpag tshad stong nas mthong bar byed cing thos par byed do/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med do/ /sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa

rgya chen po byas nas ma nyams pa'i lus blangs te dri dang me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod nas lag pa g.yas pas byin te ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /'bar ba tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa stong gis yongs su bskor te nam mkha'i mthil du 'phur bar byed do/ /

lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa skra li zhing 'khyil ba rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med pa'o/ /'bebs pa la 'dug pas so/ /dug 'joms pa la yal 'dab kyis so/ /bdag nyid srung ba la bzlas pas so/ /dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams

te ji srid lnga'i bar du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gso sbyong can gyis dag pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas bzlas par bya'o/ /gang 'dod pa de thob par byed do/ /mar la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas 'thungs shig /nyi ma bdun gyis yid gzhungs

par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar mal+li ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /mtshan mo bdun la rdzas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dkar po'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas/ u dum bA ra'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/ u dum bA ra'i

yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /dong tse lnga brgya rnyed do/ /nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong can gyis mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas mar me 'khyil pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /phyi nas bzlas pa

dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas mig thob par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du bzhugs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba

byas nas/ nyi ma gcig la thun gsum du yongs su bzlas pa lan bcu gnyis su bzlas par bya'o/ /rna ba so sor rnyed do/ /nad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting nge 'dzin nges par skyes pa'i cho gas ras sam 'bras

bu can la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas stong phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o/ /ku sha'i stan la 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing gtsang ma bgos pas yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i

gso sbyong can gyis tshes gcig nas brtsams nas ji srid gcig gi bar du bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon spyad pa byas pa'i 'o ma dang nas zan za ba'am ba lang gi gcin dang nas zan za bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gso sbyong can

gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mar me brgyad so sor sbar te pad+ma stong gis mchod par bya'o/ /nag po'i phyogs la bzlas par bya'o/ /dkar po'i tshes gcig nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar

gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o/ /gal te rgyal por gyur na/ sgrub pa po'i khang pa 'bar bar byed cing me tog gi chun bu g.yo bar byed na dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil

'khor byas nas dri dang / me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa dang gtor ma yang phul nas me tog gi ge sar brgya phrag gsum blangs te brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyi mar me gsum sbar te u dum bA ra'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas me tog re re la brgyad

brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas mar gyis byugs te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bdun du dus gsum du yongs su bzlas par byed na de'i mtshams med pa lnga bsrabs par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar zlos par byed na

sdig pa rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa'i grong de so sor rnyed pa dang / mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /til dang mA Sha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig nor skyed par byed do/ /

ba Ta'i myu gu zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi bdag dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang ldan

pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u mtha' dag rnam par bkod pa'i khyad par gyi tshogs sbyin sreg gi las rab tu sbyar bas rig bsgrub pa

po'i me la rab tu spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga dang gang du rab tu gnas pas rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya ba yod de de gang zhe na/ 'di'i rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tiSh+Tha ha ri sirga la lo hi tAk+Sha/

de hi/ da dA pa ya/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi me'i snying po ste/ las thams cad byed pa 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa bdag nyid dgongs so/ /sgrub pa pos 'dis me la sbyin sreg bya ste lan cig bzlas pa'i sreg blugs gsum me

la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /me spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can dang drag po'i las rnams rab tu sbyar ba la yam shing gi shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i don du mya ngan med pa'i shing rlan dang bcas pas khyad par du byas pa mtho gang ngam

khru gang tsam mam sor gsum pa yang sgrub pa dang / 'jam zhing mnyen pa rab tu bsngags pa ni cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /bug pa med cing khong stong yang ma yin pa ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra ba dang / de bzhin du ljang gu dang / lo ma bskams pa'am/ kha dog nag po yang sbyin par bya'o/ /

srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spangs nas bug pa med pa yang kun tu 'jog pas kha dog gzhan mchog dang tha ma nyid kyang spangs nas skam po de rnams kyang spangs pa bsregs par kun tu spyod do/ /ma rul cing mi 'khyog pa nyid dang gzhan spang bar bya'o/ /

de nas me thab kun nas gru bzhi pa byas nas 'og nyid du bskor bar bya ste/ gzhu gang dang khru gang gi tshad las khru gsum mam/ khru gnyis sam khru bzhi ste/ de bzhin kho nar srog chags rnams spangs pa rtag tu bye ma bsngags te de la pad+ma'i rnam pas so/ /de nas kha khyer

kun nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gru bzhi pa yang 'bad pas so/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar zhi ba can dang / rgyas pa can yang rung ste 'di rnams yang dag par rab tu bsgrags/ mngon spyod du ni bshad pa la/ /dbus su rdo rje bya ba ni/ /rtse mo gnyis ka rtse gsum pa/ /

gzhan yang me thab khru gnyis pa/ /thad kar yang ni bdun pa'o/ /de bzhin gtsang ma'i phyogs rgyab tu/ /chu klung ngogs kyi phyogs gcig gam/ /brtan pa'i phyogs sam dur khrod dam/ /khang stong sbyin sreg legs brtsam bya'o/ /de bzhin kho nar ri rtser

yang / /lha yi khang pa stong pa dang / /rtag tu dgon pa chen po dang / /de bzhin du yang gsum rnams ni/ /sgrub po'i phyogs su gsungs pa yin/ /gang zag mchog gi gnas de rnams/ /gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg las kun las/ /ku sha'i khres la nyer

'dug pas/ /gnas nas khru yi tshad las ni/ /sbyin sreg las rnams khyad par du/ /der ni gsang sngags shes pas bya'o/ /dngos grub myur ba kho nar gnas/ /nyid du gnas par the tsom med/ /shar du bltas dang byang du bltas pa'ang / /zhi dang rgyas pa

can la bya/ /drag po la ni lho ru ste/ /de nas sngags pas rnam par spang / /shar du kha bltas zhi ba 'phel/ /rgyas pa la yang byang bltas pa/ /'di rnams sngags pas dus lhan cig /rig pa bzlas pas yang dag brtsam/ /bil ba arka pa lak+Sha/ /n+ya gro d+ha

yis rgyas las bya/ /mngon spyod can la shing rnams ni/ /dkar dang tsha ba skyur dang rno/ /de rnams thams cad spang bya ste/ /thub pa rnams kyis bkag pa yin/ /rtag tu zhi dang rgyas las la/ /brlan bcas shing ni rab tu bsngags/ /de bzhin skam po drag las

so/ /thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs/ /de rnams med pa'i yam shing gis/ /shing de rnams su brtag par bya/ /ljang dang snum pa 'dra ba dang / /rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa/ /de bzhin ku sha'i rnam pa yis/ /zhi dang rgyas pa rtag tu bya/ /maR+gad dang

ni 'dra ba dang / /de bzhin dkar po'i rtsa rnams kyis/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya/ /rgyal ba mchog gis bkag pa yin/ /'dir ni dri med chu la yang / dag pa srin bu spangs pa las/ /rtag tu de nas mngon par bkru/ /kun nas bskor ba bya ba yang / /

rang snang phyi rol brtson pa'am/ /cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya/ /gtsang mas rtswa yis sgron ma'i tshad la bya ba'o/ /de nas khu tshur tshad byas na/ /'bad pas ma ni sbar bar bya/ /kha yi rlung gis phu mi bya/ /de bzhin gos kyi mtha' yis dang / /gos kyi chun po'am sham

thabs dang / /sgrib g.yogs dag ni spangs pa yis/ /nam mkha'i nor dang tha dad rlung / /nye bar bcom dang mngon dga' ba'am/ /gtsang ma nyams pa bral bas dang / /de bzhin gos dang nor bus kyang / /rlung yab bya'o rlung bzang pos/ /me ni yang dag brtsam

par bya/ /de las gyur pa'i rlung 'di yis/ /sngags shes me ni sbar bar bya/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyin sreg don/ /bud med mchog gzhan brtag pa dag /byas nas yang ni mtha' ru ni/ /ba yi mar gyi sreg blugs gsum/ /der ni sbyin bya de las ni/ /

gang yang tshad du bya ba'o/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad dang / /rang rang sngags kyis mgon po la/ /de nas ji bzhin 'dod phyag bya/ /de tshe me la sbyin sreg bya/ /gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas pa yis/ /rtag tu me ni spyan drang ngo / /bdag nyid rtsom pa'i dri zhim

po'i/ /me tog kho nas rtag tu 'bod/ /sngags pa gnas la mkhas pa yis/ /gdan ni gnas la phul ba pa/ /gsang sngags des so gzhan du min/ /zho ldan mar dang bsres pa la/ /sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing gsum/ /rgyas don

me la sbyin sreg bya/ /sngags kyi las kyis thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i gdan la nyer 'dug pas/ /zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya/ /rgyas pa can la 'di rnams nyid/ /sbyin bya gzugs mthun sngags rnams kyis/ /mngon spyod can du gnas pa la/ /

gzhan gyi gzugs su blta bar bya/ /dri ma med pa'i lha rnams ni/ /rim pa bzhin du me thab tu/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dri/ /bdun du yongs su bzlas pa yis/ /mngon par bos pa de yi tshe/ /'byur gnas nges par gzhag pa rnams/ /ji ltar gnyis

kar gnas de bzhin/ /yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin kho nas zho bsres pas/ /bya'o stong ngam 'bum tshad dam/ /yang na brgya rtsa brgyad rtag bya/ /sngags ni blangs nas de bzhin du/ /rig pa lan cig bzlas pa

yi/ /mig dang gtsug phud 'bar ba yi/ /phreng ba'i me la me lce gcig /de bzhin nyid du zhi ba'i las/ /sbyin sreg nges par bya ba yang / /rgyas pa can la de dang dbang / /drag po'i las ni smad pa ste/ /rgyas pas spangs so sbyin sreg las/ /rab sbyor me ni

bsngags par 'gyur/ /sgra gcan brgyad cu'i stobs dang ldan/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu bsngags/ /der ni gsang sngags rtag sgrub byed/ /dkar ba'i me la sbyin sreg bya/ /gal te kha dog dmar de bzhin/ /rtag tu rgyas pa'i dngos grub 'dod/ /nag po dud

kha ser skya la'ang / /g.yon pa can zhes bya ba nyid/ /kha dog rnam gsum rab 'jug pa/ /dngos grub rnam pa gsum yin no/ /sngags pa las gzhan kha dog gam/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid/ /de la sngags kyi dngos grub med/ /slar yang lag pa'i mthil 'dir ni/

rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid/ /kha dog gsal ba de 'dra yod/ /me ni 'bar ba mthong nas ni/ /slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya/ /spyan drangs byas la gzugs kha dog /gal te sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /slar yang sbyin sreg rab 'jug pa/ /

las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba nyid/ /me la sngags ni brjod par bya/ /sngar ni rab tu btags pas kyang / /dkyil 'khor 'di ru rnam pa gzhan/ /mchog de nyid kyis de gyis shig /sbyin sreg 'di la spyan drang dang / /

gshegs su gsol ba'i las can gyis/ /las rnams de nyid kyis bya'o/ /der ni me yi spyod pa'i las/ /de bzhin gzugs dang ras ris kyi/ /spyan sngar brtsams nas 'grub par byed/ /de la sngags ni sngar brjod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

rgyal bas bsngags/ /las rnams kun nas der bya'o/ /gzhan pa'i las rnams mi bya ste/ /khyad par sdig pa can gyi las/ /rgyal ba mchog gis smad pa dang / /gang du 'jig rten dang 'gal smad/ /'khor los sgyur ba nyid du langs/ /de nas byang sems

sa yi bdag /de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob pa/ /de nas lha nyid 'grub par byed/ /'dir ni rtag tu sbyor shes pa/ /ras ris sbyin sreg las la mkhas/ /sa 'og bdag po nyid dang ni/ /bar snang la ni spyod par byed/ /de nas sa bla'i lha dang ni/ /gnod sbyin

nyid dam gnod sbyin mo/ /'gugs par byed cing rtag tu yang / /rgyal srid kyi ni bdag po nyid/ /yang na yul 'dir 'khor ba nyid/ /yang na rig dang rig 'dzin nyid/ /lha min nyid dang sems can kun/ /dbang byed rjes 'gro 'gugs par byed/ /sems

dpa' chen po yang dag pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sems can sa bcur gnas bcas pa/ /sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs par byed/ /sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /lhag ma'i bdag po nyid de bzhin/ /khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid/ /

'byung po kun la yang dag nges/ /mi bdag nyid dang de bzhin yang / /dbang gi don du sems can kun/ /mi bdag des sam mi des ni/ /sa stengs thams cad mnyam pa yis/ /las rnams de bzhin kun nas ni/ /rtag tu sbyin sreg gis

bya'o/ /nges par las kun yang dag brten/ /bdag nyid brtsams pas lhan cig sgrub/ /dpal gyi don du de yi las/ /mchog dang bar ma nyid dang yang / /yang na chung ngu nyid bsgrub bya/ /de nyid du ni rdzas kun gyi/ /dngos grub brjod pa'i don du slar/ /lhan

cig dngos grub blta bar bya/ /sbyin sreg las la legs 'jug pa/ /las rnams kun la phyag rgya bcing / /bdag srung mar dang ldan pa yi/ /sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug byed/ /de nas ras ris gsang sngags 'di/ /bdun bzlas pa'am brgyad bzlas pa/ /

rtag tu las 'dis spyod lam bya/ /na maHsar+b+ba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nA na/ a pra ti ha ta ga ti satwA nA na/ tad+ya thA/ auM dz+wa la tiShA hU~M/ ru ru bi shwa sam+b+ha be swA hA/ shing la sbyor ba 'dis bzlas te/ /slar yang gnyis sam bdun bzlas pas/ /sngags rig me la sbyin

sreg gis/ /me tog bdug pa dri yang rung / /kun nas thams cad nyid la ni/ /lan bdun bzlas pa 'di nyid kyis/ /khyod kyis rab tu brjod par bya/ /las rnams thams cad rtsom byed pa/ /cho ga rgyu yi snga ma yis/ /rab sbyor nyid kyis bya ba'o/ /

las rnams kun la sngar bcings pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen mo grags ldan ma/ /de bzhin bsrungs pa byas gyur nas/ /dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rtsom par byos/ /gal te nus pa mthong ba na/ /dge ba'i sgra rnams nyid dang ni/ /

rtag tu 'bras can sa de yi/ /gsang sngags ji ltar 'dod bzhin du/ /nges par mchog 'di sbyin pa'o/ /dang po las kyi rab sbyor ba/ /gsang sngags rgyu yis rab zhugs pa/ /'bras bur bcas pa kho na yi/ /dngos grub de rnams bsgrub par bya/ /rgyal ba'i sgra dang

pa Ta ha/ /rnga bo che yi dngos grub nges/ /thams cad du ni smad par brjod/ /sbyin sreg la ni gnas bcas pa/ /gzhan yang dge mtshan mchog dang ni/ /'dab chags can nam dge ba'i sgra/ /rnam pa sna tshogs des sgrogs pa'i/ /sgra yang rung ste rgyal bas

bsngags/ /rab bsngags dus bcas lha rnams dang / /yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs sgra/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /btsun mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang / /mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu/ /rnam pa 'di

yis bsngags pa'am/ /rab bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i/ /dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/ /de rnams mthong na gsang sngags kyi/ /sna tshogs spyod yul dngos grub bo/ /zhes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde

ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa las bgrang 'phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam bcu gcig pa yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mi'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad las rkang shu dang /

gdug pa'i rma rnams la sa'i gong bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byin na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon spyad pa byas pas ba byung lngas lus sbyang ba byas nas dus gsum du khrus byas te 'o ma btung bar bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/ /

phyi nas nag po'i brgyad pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ bil ba'i yam shing la mar dang zho dang / sbrang rtsi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyi bo nas 'od zer

'byung bar byed do/ /des sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog gsum po rnams gang rnyed pa de rnyed do/ /rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi rgyal

srid dang / khyod ji 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba nga'o zhes so/ /dngos grub 'di ni bla ma mchod pa dang / snying rjes sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas sbyin pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed do/ /nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris

kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas arka'i yam shing gi stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /gang 'dod pa de skad cig nyid la 'gugs par byed do/ /a ga ru dang / pri yang ku dang nA ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam pa phye mar byas te/ kham phor kha sbyar du

byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas lus la byugs te g.yul du zhugs na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag bcu gcig

zlos shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong ngo / /ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bdun zlos shig me snang bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis btab pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag lnga zlos shig /nad 'joms par byed do/ /sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis

zlos shig /bcud dam bcud kyis len so sor rnyed do/ /de zos pas gnyer ma dang skra dkar spangs par 'gyur ro/ /lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis

shig /rgyal ba'i btsun mo dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu sbyin te 'dod pa nye bar bzhag pa ni ma gtogs so/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /gser srang brgya so sor rnyed do/ /'bras yos stong phrag

brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /bgegs med par 'gyur ro/ /pi n+yA ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig /skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag gsum zlos shig /rked pa'i nad med par 'gyur ro/ /rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyag par bya'o/ /bu

mos bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya'o/ /skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro/ /dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /gos bye ba bcu gnyis so sor rnyed do/ /rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i srang shin tu mdzes

pa la 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu pa byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe me stag 'phro bar byed pa dang

ji srid du 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas grub par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'du bar byed cing 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur bar byed do/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang / thogs pa med par 'gro bar

byed do/ /snga bar langs nas lor bzlas par byed do/ /mchog sbyin par byed do/ /zla ba drug tu lan cig brjod pas nad chen po grol lo/ /zla ba gcig tu zlos shig dus ma yin par gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byed do/ /nyin gcig pa dang /

nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams su'o/ /bud med dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar lA pan la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'di ni yugs

sa mos skyes bu yi'o/ /rgyal po ni ras ris kyi spyan sngar arga'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa la mtshan mo thun gsum du lan tshwa nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin

sreg gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mgo bo la lan gsum mam bdun du mngon par bsngags nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug par byed na rgyal po'i gnang chen por 'gyur ro/ /brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i rma bya'i mdongs kyis phyag par byas na dug 'joms so/ /ldong ros a

shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pas yang dag par brtsam par bya ste skal pa bzang por 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ 'o ma dang nas zan za zhing dus gsum

du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum du brjes te/ a ga ru dang tu ruSh+ka dang / tsan+dan rnams bsregs shing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa'am/ thang las skyes pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog dang pa'i mar

gyi mar me gsum mo/ /mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do/ /thun mtshams su bza' ba yang ji ltar nus pa sbyin no/ /ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs

nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas a shwat+tha'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /de nas ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ba dang / sa 'gul ba dang / mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang / phreng ba g.yo bar byed pa ste/

mtshan ma 'di rnams kyis grub par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i mig sman a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums te stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs byas nas/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste/ ji srid grub pa rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /'bras bu can

la gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming bris te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gang du klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o/ /de'i klu des las thams cad rdzogs par byed do/ /nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos sbyin par byed do/ /'bras bu can la

mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas mngon par bris nas/ de bzhin du khron pa'am/ mtsho phran du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul byed du gzhug go/ /der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gnas so/ /de nas blang bar bya ste chu klung

gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa bgrod dka' ba can gyi 'dun sa'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste lha rnams dran par byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o/ /de 'phags pa'i zhal du yang bcug nas cung zad yang dag par gsungs par mdzod

cig ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur ro/ /chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bsams te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa'i chu des mche ba can la gtor bar bya'o/ /dug med par 'gyur ro/ /de la brjod pa'i cho gas

dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa ni don med par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung blangs nas tsA ru bza' zhing mi smya bar dkyil 'khor byas nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te ji srid gsum pa'i bar de srid du bzlas par bya ste 'bum bzlas so/ /zla ba drug tu tshangs par spyod pa dang

brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad cing zla bas dngos grub dang / zla ba drug gis 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyis kyang mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed do/ /zla bas sngags thams cad grub par byed do/ /gang 'dod pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par bris

nas de'i steng du rkang pa g.yon pa bzhag ste g.yogs pa'i phyogs su 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do/ /klu thams cad kyi gnas su rab tu 'jug par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /der rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /de bzhin

du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byed do/ /thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas nas rdul chung ngu blangs te sbrul gyi steng du yongs su thor cig /sbrul bzlog pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste gos

dkar po'i kha dog can las las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu bcug nas khug cig shi yang slong bar byed do/ /ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang ral gri dang / sta gri dang / 'khor lo dang / b+huShuN+Dal sogs pa rnams

ba byung lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs bya ste/ rdzas gang yang rung ba blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar zlos shig phyi nas ji ltar byas pa'i rin gyis ldong ros blangs nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar te ji srid

me'i mdog tu gyur pa de srid du bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba las byung ba'i po ma bu mos bsrubs pas mar du byas nas thal ba mar la gdab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod sbrang rtsis bkang ba la yang ngo / /de nas blangs te gur gum gyi za

ma tog tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid srung ba byas te zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ma swat+tha'i 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu dkris nas bzhis dgab par bya'o/ /ku sha'i khres

la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pas mnan nas ji srid dro ba dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do/ /du bas mi snang ba'o/ /'bar bas nam mkha'

la 'gro'o/ /lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do/ /sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /de bzhin du mig sman ba bla sgrub par byed pa dang / gi wang la cho ga 'di'o/ /dkar po'i lnga la pad+ma'i 'dab mar bzhag ste ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas

lag pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te/ ji srid dro ba dang / du ba 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /'di nyid la dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo/ /ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcur zlos shig /de nas bzo bo dbang po ma tshang ba min pa gso

sbyong can gyis lcags gsum gyis pad+ma 'dab ma bcu pa'am/ brgyad pa gdan dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa byas nas gur gum dang / gi wang dang / ga bur rnams nam mkha'i chus btags pa pad+mar bcug cing / dkar po'i brgyad pa la/ ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan

mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas lag pa g.yas pas pad+ma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas pad+ma des 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /

sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do/ /de bzhin du gdu bu dang / cod pan dang / lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo yang zhes pa'o/ /'di ni 'khor lo'i khyad par te lcags lnga ba'i 'khor lo byas nas

so rnon po 'khor lo mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mtho gang gi tshad do/ /gang gA'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gong bur bya'o/ /de la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsan+dan dmar pos mchod de kar bI ra'i me tog dmar po dang phreng ba phul nas dkar

po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis smyung bar gnas pas/ slong mos dge 'dun la ston mo byas te dngos grub stsal bar bya'o/ /gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa

la sogs pa rnams phul nas ji ltar nye bar 'byor pa'i mar me phul nas 'khor lo'i phyogs bzhi ru yang mar me bzhi dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ tsan+dan dmar pos btags pa rnams la lan re bzlas te re res bsnun par bya'o/ /

ji srid stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du'o/ /de nas 'khor lo sgra dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / de nas 'bar ro gnyis pa la 'khor lo nges par 'gro ste/ de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas rig pa zlos shig de blang par bya'o/ /

blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag bcur rig pa 'dzin pa chen po klu dang gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mang du 'dod par 'gyur te/ lo stong phrag lnga 'tsho bar byed do/ /shi na yang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de

nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na/ sai le ta ka dang / tsan+dan dmar bo dang / rgya skyegs dang / gu gul dang / tA ra bar ta ka'i rtsa ba dang / lcags kyi phye ma dang / gi ri kaR+Ni dang / 'bru'i phub ma dang / ru rta dang / rgya spos dang / sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling

dang / tu ruSh+ka rnams gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byed du gzhug go/ /de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar gyis gcig tu byas nas phye ma des rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam gyi ril bu byed du gzhug go/ /de nas dkar

po'i brgyad pa'am/ dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can gyis ril bu lnga tsam blangs te a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums pa byas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bgrang phreng dang til mar dang / phye ma la sogs pa

gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ mchod pa'i cho ga byas pas lag pa g.yas pas mnan te ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ /yang dag par bgos te/ khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /lha gzugs can

rnams 'ong ngo / /grub pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas mthong ngo / /lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do/ /de nas 'bar byed nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub rnam pa gnyis so/ /'di yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub

pa'i thabs su 'gyur ro/ /gsum pa'am bdun pa'i sgrub pa la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams 'grub par byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog par sgrub

thabs thams cad ces bya ba 'di rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag par gzigs nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su son pa'i byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ mi dang 'byung po'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams la rjes brtse bas/ /dkyil 'khor las can thams cad ni/ /sems dpa' chen po smros shig smros/ /sgrol

ma'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang / /phun tshogs thams cad mngon par 'phel/ /sgrub po rnams la phan pa yi/ /don phyir 'dren pas rgyas par smros/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung thams cad kyi/ /lus can bar mar gyur pa rnams/ /khyod kyi tshig gi mchog

gyur pa/ /'byung 'gyur de dag thos nas ni/ /myur du lha rnams sgrub pa la/ /sems can gang du rab zhugs pa/ /de nyid du ni sngar bshad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang / /sangs rgyas bye ba stong rnams kyis/ /thams cad de la rjes yi

rang / /dkyil 'khor sdig pa kun 'joms pa/ /dngos grub kun byed dge ba ni/ /sems can rnams kyi mgon pos smros/ /sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor khyod kyi tshig /sems can cho ga yang dag 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gang 'di thos nas ni/ /rab tu

dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ /dpal min 'joms shing zhi ba dang / /de bzhin nad dang dgra 'phrog cing / /dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad kyi/ /gzi brjid stobs ni rnam par 'phel/ /mthong ngam thos nas de nas ni/ /rab tu dad pa skyed par byed/ /gang

yin de rnams bdag gis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni/ /thob pa'i ched du'ang lung bstan to/ /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ni/ /rjes su yi rang 'gyur ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor phun tshogs 'phel

byed pa/ /de bzhin yon tan kun sdud pa/ /sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor rmad byung ba/ /sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten mgon/ /yang dag bka' yis smros shig smros/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la tha mi dad pa'i tshigs

su bcad pas bstod pa'i tshig gis mngon par bstod do/ /shAkya'i rgyal po lha yi rgyal/ /phun tshogs yon tan du ma can/ /rab bsngags rdzu 'phrul rab ma nyams/ /rgyun du dkar ba'i gos dang ldan/ /mchod sdong zhal ni 'dam skyes dri/ /blo bzang

snying po bstan pa 'dzin/ /gang phyir khyod ni phun tshogs nyid/ /'di ni 'gro ba de dag gi/ /dga' bas dga' bar byed pa ni/ /mgon po lha rnams kyi ni ste/ /rang bzhin dran pas kun tu snang / /de yi tshig ni rab rig pa/ /dpa' de chags pa zad pa nyid/ /

'bras bu gsum nyid 'dzin par byed/ /de de gzhan du de yis ni/ /lha yi mdzes mas kun bsrungs pa/ /brgyad kyis 'dir ni dbang zhal las/ /skyes pa'i dpa' bo rab stobs dang / /g.yo ba'i spro dga'i dbang po dang / /kun nas gser gyi ri dang ldan/ /

cod pan yang ni lhan cig gdan/ /lha dang lha min lhar bcas pa'i/ /lhag pa'i theg pa thams cad kyang / /'jig rten bar do'i srid pa dang / /skye ba khyod kyi srog la sogs/ /byung ba mdzes ldan rang nyid kyi/ /'di yi mig ni dga' ba ste/ /gang rnams zla ba lta

bur dkar/ /lha rnams kyis bzung ri bong can/ /kun da du ku dkar po yi/ /gos ni mnabs nyid tsa kor/ /brgya byin 'dab brgya pa yi mig /sa srungs phrag par phyogs gcig 'gro/ /bla ma'i ri la ri bong can/ /rgyal po'i dpung ldan brgya byin ni/ /mig brgya brtson

'grus ma nyams pas/ /grangs dang chu gter chu 'byin pa/ /tshogs kyi sgra ni dga' ba dang / dri med spyan ni dga' ba la'ang / /nyi ma'i 'od zer dam pa ni/ /rnam pas zas dang dri 'khor ba/ /bum dkar gang ba so so yi/ /bum pa de rnams dbang bskur zhing / /tsan+dan sa

mchog yan lag bshad/ /gi bang thig le rnam par bkra /yan lag dam pa yongs 'du ba'i/ /dga' ba mchog gi yan lag dang / /lus med gzhom pa'i ched du byas/ /yan lag chags pa byas mtha' las/ /khrus ni stug pos mi 'pho bas/ /gzhan du

'chi med legs pa ni/ /de 'og thal mo sbyar ba yi/ /dug gis btab pa smad pa ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog brjod pa'i/ /char ldan khyod kyi zhal du ni/ /sngon las khyod ni lam gyi mgo/ /dri ma bzhin du spangs pa yang / /me tog ldan pa'i zla ba la/ /

rnam par tshar phyin longs spyod ldan/ /bcings pa lta bur 'di rnams nyid/ /btsos nas sngar med cho ga yis/ /bcu par khyod ni zhi ba ste/ /mgon med 'gro ba mtha' yas las/ /gang phyir srid pa mtha' med cing / /dri mas lha dang lha min yang / /de yi brtul

zhugs phan tshun du/ /dam pa'i spyan gyi 'od kyis snang / /'khyil pa spyan yangs yan lag mchog /phyogs su lha rnams gnas pa dang / /mi rnams byang chub rnam sangs rgyas/ /rab tu byed 'gyur zhes pa ni/ /mi rnams 'byung dang sdud pa'i las/ /de phyir

rnam pad chu skyes ni/ /lha yi yan lag dam par son/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag dkris chags bral/ /'chi bzhin sa yi lus kyang 'khod/ /kun nas gtod dang kun nas sdud/ /yang dag sa dang phyogs dang ldan/ /rnam bzhi mnyam par byang chub ldan/ /byang chub shing

drung bdud dpung las/ /rnam par rgyal ba thob pa dang / /sangs rgyas go 'phang 'pho med dang / /klu yi shing gi rtsa ba ru/ /zhe sdang rtsub po'i nags rnams kyis/ /rkang pa stong bu me yi ched/ /rmongs mun dri ma snang byed pa/ /khro bo'i me ni 'bar ba la/ /mi g.yo

rab tu sbyin par byed/ /phyag rgya rdo rje lta bu sgom/ /gzhal ba'i 'khri shing gzugs brnyan brtan/ /dmar po'i me ni 'bar ba ni/ /'jigs pa'i nyi ltar rnam mdzes pa/ /yan lag stobs bskyed phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas rang gi stan la 'khod de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma

thag tu sems dpa' chen po'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma byung ste 'od zer de rnams kyis gang gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kun tu snang bar byas par gyur to/ /dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de

la sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so/ /sems dpa' chen po smros

shig /mthu chen po sems can sdig pa can thams cad dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba smros shig /gang gis de lta bu de rnams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med pa rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su

bskor ba dang / lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba dang / sa chen po ri dang / nags dang / phug tu bcas pa 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sngags bshad par brtsams so/ /dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon dam tshig mthong bas slob dpon dang mtshungs

pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob cing dad pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ sems can rnams kyi stobs dang / stobs ma yin pa shes pa/ ser sna med cing g.yo sgyu med pas nag po med cing ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba dri ngan pa med pas dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa/ mdzes

pa/ snying stobs dang ldan pas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / snying rje dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa/ sems can gyi dgongs pa dang / bsam pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas

dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba/ cha mang po mngon par shes pa/ gsal zhing gsal bar smra ba/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la byang ba/ rig gsum gang yang rung ba'i rig pa la sogs pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa/ phyag dang

dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor ba shes pa/ mchod rten gyi las byas pa/ ha cang mi rgan byis pa dang / rigs dma' bar skyes pa ma yin pa/ gzhon zhing lang tsho dang ldan pa dang / tshul bzang po'i sgrub pa pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o zhes so/ /

de nas 'di lta bu'i slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brtsam par bya ste/ nus med 'dul nyes ma yin pa/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag rab sbyar bya/ /rmongs pa'i sems dang chags can la/ /dkyil 'khor bstan par yang mi bya/ /gang zhig

bslab la yud tsam yang / /lhag par 'gro ba'i lus can des/ /mtho ris thar pa yang dag 'grub/ /yid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni rjes zhig pa'i/ /dngos grub dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /byang chub rtsa bar rig thob pa'i/ /

sems de las ni yang dag brtsam/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams/ /bdag nyid kho nar rab rtogs bya/ /de la bstan bya'i dkyil 'khor bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob

dpon gyis/ /stobs kyis sngon 'dul si tha'i lus/ /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la/ /grong dang grong khyer grong rdal dang / /ljongs rnams su ni byang shar gyi/ /phyogs kyi cha ru mchod yon byin/ /sa yi mthil du de ji ltar/ /sa phyogs sngags la sngags 'gyur ba/ /

snun dang ljon shig me tog bzang / /'bras bu yang dag mang po can/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i phyogs/ /dkar dang ser ba'i sa gzhi la/ /gyo mo bong ba gseg ma bral/ /rnga bo che yi sgra dbyangs dang / /lam gyi bzhi mdo dur khrod dang / /

lha gzhan yongs su bzung ba dang / /shis shing sdug bsngal rdzogs spangs la/ /gang du kun nas rgyang grags lnga'i/ /tshad du chu klung lteng ka dang / /mtsho phan chu bo rab 'bab pa/ /ljon shing mchod rten lha khang dang / /me tog nyid ni dus rgyun du/ /shin tu

rgya chen yang dag ldan/ /cho 'phrul phyogs ni gang rung la/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon sa phyogs der/ /nyi ma gung la song nas ni/ /ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yi/ /mngon par mdzes pa'i las bya'o/ /thog mar rab

dag sems can kun/ /byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor gnas der yid kyis dmigs/ /dge ba'i rig pa gdon par bya/ /sgrol ma'i snying po dam pa dang / /de bzhin dbyangs ni rjes su gdon/ /'dir ni sangs rgyas mchod don du/ /dkyil

'khor lus can kun gyis bri/ /phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i gnas su gnas/ /thog mar gtor ma byin byas nas/ /dri yi yam shing yang dag ldan/ /gnas su gnas pas kun zos nas/ /bzhin du spyan drang ba'i/ /dbyangs kyis tshig 'di brjod par

bya/ /slob dpon ming ni che ge bdag /bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar 'tshal/ /bdag dang sems can kun gyis gang / /bdag mthar gdug pa'i sems med pa/ /bskyed cing bkur stir byed pa dang / /sangs

rgyas bstan la rab dad pa'i/ /sems can rnams la phyir zhing ni/ /mang du rab tu dad pa'i ched/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar bdag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum brjod/ /de nas sems can de rnams ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon

gyis/ mtshan mo mthong ba sbyin par byed/ /de nas bris pa'am gzhan du song / /tho rangs rmi lam rnam par spyad/ /sa yi phyogs der song nas ni/ /khru brgya yi ni tshad du yang / /kun nas gru bzhi pa ru bya/ /phyi rol dpag tu med pa yi/ /dkon mchog

gsum gyi tshad song nas/ /sa la shing dang phub ma dang / /thal ba sol ba so phag dang / /skra dang sen mo mchod sbyin gyi/ /so phag nag po la sogs gang / /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dge ba yi/ /mi dge'i zug rngu thams cad kun/ /lhag ma med par

bas la nas ni/ /sa yi gong bu de nyid du/ /gzhan yang chu klung chen po yi/ /'gram gnyis sa ni sbyang byas nas/ /rab tu bcug ste thobs brdung / /tsan+dan chu yis yang dag gtor/ /de ltar byas nas ma ltung ba'i/ /ba byung tsan+dan chu bsres nas/ /khru brgyad

pa yi phyogs su ni/ /phyi rol gyis kyang khru bcu yi/ /tshad du yongs su sbyangs pa la/ /gso sbyong sbyin nas byug tu gzhug /ji srid sa yi phyogs der ni/ /shin tu 'jam zhing shin tu ni/ /legs par rdzogs par skyes kyi bar/ /de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni/ /

de nas khru bzhi'i tshad du ni/ /grwa bzhi seng ldeng phur bu brgyad/ /sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /gzhon nu mas bkal srad bu ni/ /tshon sna lnga pa legs 'jam pa/ /shin tu sra ba bcom ldan ma'i/ /rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun gyis/ /bsngags pas phur bu la

dkris nas/ /bdun byas srod la gdab par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni bgos pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus de ru/ /rtsa ba nag po med pa yi/ /bum blang dri yi chu dang ni/ /me tog sgron mas bkang ba la/ /mgrin par me

tog phreng bar dkris/ /a mra'i yal 'dab kha dgab bya/ /pus mo dag ni nges btsugs nas/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa bdun byas te/ /yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/ /de nas phyogs bcur kun bltas nas/ /'di ni bsgrag bya che ge dag /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas mchod

pa'i phyir/ /sems can kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /bsam byas dkyil 'khor bris pa 'dir/ /sangs rgyas phan par mdzad pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor du ni byon par mdzod/ /da lta 'dir ni byon nas kyang / /bdag gi mchod yon bzhes su gsol/ /de dbus nyid du brtag bya

ba/ /gnas su bris pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan drang bya zhing lha rnams kyi/ /gnas mdor bstan nas brjod par bya/ /dga' ldan du ni byang chub sems/ /'jig rten gzhan du gang gnas pa/ /de bzhin kha ba'i gnas su dang / /gang ldan pad+ma'i dbang phyug 'byung / /lcang

lo can du nor dbang phyug /te se ru ni bde byed bshad/ /mchod yon snod ni bkang ba yis/ /de rnams gnas ni rnam bsam bya/ /de nas zhal ni srub bsnyen bkur/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams thams cad la/ /ming dang gnas ni yongs nyams na/ /phyin ci log tu ldog

par 'gyur/ /de ltar nyi ma bdun du ni/ /nyin re nyin re tsan+dan gyi/ /chu yis byug tu gzhug par bya/ /mtshan mo'i thun la'ang de bzhin bya/ /bar 'dir yo byad thams cad ni/ /rnam par 'byor par 'gyur ba yin/ /de la 'di ni brjod bya ste/ /dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa

yi/ /phye ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin skyes/ /dzi ba'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'i/ /phye mas dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/ /pad+ma rA ga ut+pa la/ /phye ma mtha' dag gis gdab bya/ /gur gum chu dang mtshungs pa dang / /puSh+pa rA ga yi dkyil 'khor/ /zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs shing / /

de bzhin ma ra ka tas kyang / /de tsam kha dog rin chen ma/ /lcags kyang rung ste ming can lnga/ /yang na dris btags phye mas sam/ /ji ltar snyed pa rnam sprul pas/ /rab bkug rin chen phye ma yis/ /yang dag pa yi dngos grub 'dod/ /nor bu mching bu mtshungs

min gang / /pad+ma rA gas rnam pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad kyang / /slob dpon gyis ni gzhon nu ma'i/ /lag pas byed du gzhug par bya/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rigs skyes pa/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /ma nor skyes pa rab mdzes pa/ /dbang

po ma tshang ma yin pa/ /mdor na bud med mtshan nyid dang / /yang dag ldan par skyes pa yis/ /'di 'dra'i gzhon nu ma gcig gnyis/ /gsum la gso sbyong sbyin nas ni/ /'o ma'i zas kyis mngon dga' bar/ /byas nas dkar po'i gos bgos te/ /dkyil

'khor yo byad thams cad ni/ /byed gzhug dkyil 'khor yo byad kun/ /legs bsags so sor brtags pa yis/ /chu dang rnam par dben pa dang / /dge slong 'dul ba byas pa dang / /yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang / /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /

slob dpon rang gi lhag gnas ched/ /phye ma thams cad bdug pa bri/ /gtor ma dang ni mar rnams ni/ /cho ga can gyis byed du gzhug /de nas slob dpon yo byad kun/ /tshogs nas dkyil 'khor rang nyid bre/ /slob ma yongs su bzung bar gyis/ /de

rnams sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge slong dge 'dun la rab dang / /yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pa/ /bden par smra dang spom pa min/ /mdzes pa mthong dang kha dog gtsigs/ /gzung bar mi bya gcig gnyis gsum/ /brgyad dang ni gzhan bcu drug /

de rnams skyabs gsum yongs su 'dzin/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /'o ma'i ston mo bza' ba dang / /'o ma'i shing las byung ba yi/ /so shing sor mo brgyad kyi tshad/ /bcom ldan rtsa ba'i snying po yis/ /lan ni nyi shu rtsa bdun du/ /mngon par

bsngags nas ba yi gcin/ /rab sbyar mtshan mo'i thun mtshams su/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi phyi rol du/ /shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yi/ /khres la rim pas nyer 'dug nas/ /snying po re re lag par byin/ /rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/ /

gtsug tor bcing la'ang bdun bzlas bya/ /de nas so shing de rnams la/ /byin nas rang rang so shing bza'/ /ral gcig ma yi snying po yis/ /lan bdun bsngags pa'i dri yi chus/ /spyi bor mngon par gtor bar bya/ /de nas de rnams la brjod bya/ /

bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /dbang phyug mchog gi thugs rje can/ /chen po'i mchog ni sbyin pa po/ /bsgral dka' sgrol ba dran par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma yang / /rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub

sems dpa' kun/ /skyed par byed ma dran par gyis/ /de yi 'og tu slob dpon gyis/ /slob ma de rnams kun la ni/ /'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos/ /brtan par byas nas de rnams mdun/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bklag bya/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /bud

med rnams kyang yongs gzung bya/ /langs nas bu mos bkal ba yis/ /srad bu tshon sna lnga pa ni/ /mi mnyam rgyud du bsgrim pa la/ /dri yi chu yis mngon bkrus nas/ /re rer pad+ma'i bgrang phreng gis/ /bsang gtor byas nas rtsa ba yi/ /snying po lan grangs nyer gcig

tu/ /mngon bsngags de la 'dir brjod bya/ /dpal gyi gzhi ni yod pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs mtshan ma/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba ste/ /pad+ma'i bgrang phreng de phyir bsngags/ /de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis/ /slob ma rnams la cha phra mos/ /lag

pa la ni bcing bar bya/ /slob ma rnams la gang kho na/ /de nyid slob ma bdag nyid bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas pa/ /shar du mngon phyogs bla gos ni/ /phrag pa gcig tu byas nas ni/ /pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni/ /sa la rab tu btsugs byas te/ /rtsa ba'i

phyag rgya bcing ba dang / /rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thams cad dang / /rang rgyal 'phags pa nyan thos dang / /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / /lha mi'i dri dang me tog gi /phreng ba yongs su 'dzin pa yis/ /kun la gsol ba gdab par bya/ /

dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon bdag /che ge mo zhes bya ba yis/ /bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal lags na/ /de dag rang nyid byon par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas/ /nyan

thos lha klu gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min nam mkha' lding / /mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /rang gi rig pa sngags tshogs kyis/ /yongs bskor sems can thams cad la/ /rjes su brtse bas byon nas kyang / /bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzod/ /de ltar yang gnyis yang

gsum du/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pa dang / /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la bltas nas/ /dbus su me tog phreng ba dor/ /gal te me tog phreng g.yo byed/ /de nas byon par shes par bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas byang sems la/ /dri yi

chu yis mchod yon dang / /me tog phul cig de nas ni/ /khru brgya'i phyi rol sa gzhi la/ /yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ru/ /a pA marga'i yam shing gis/ /me ni rab tu sbar byas nas/ /shar du mngon phyogs ku sha yis/ /rtsa ba'i snying po sbrang rtsi zho/ /mar gyi sreg blugs

brgyad brgyar dbul/ /de nas sangs rgyas byang sems dang / /lha rnams la yang mchod yon dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru/ /gso sbyong yongs su blangs pa yis/ /skyes bu srung ba'i phreng ba dang / /dbang po tshang ba gzhag par bya/ /de la 'dir ni brjod bya ste/ /gang

zhig rnam pa gzhan bya ba/ /skyong ba bral bar 'gyur ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig brgyad rnams ni/ /yang dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir cho ga byas pa yis/ /slob mas dam tshig shes par 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang / /rab gnas slob mas thabs cig

tu/ /song nas ku sha bting ba la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /tshogs kun rjes su dran pa yis/ /g.yas pa'i gzhogs kyis nyal bar bya/ /de nas tho rangs slob dpon gyis/ /gtsang ma shar du kha phyogs pas/ /rmi lam rnam par dpyad par bya/ /de la 'di ni brjod

bya ste/ /gang zhig tsan+dan bil ba sogs/ /u dum bA ra sogs n+ya gro d+ha/ /rgyal mtshan phreng bas khyab pa dang / /rmi lam rab tu dad pa'ang rung / /kha cig me lce mdzes pa dang / /de ltar mthong ba de dngos grub/ /mchog gi bar du'o ngang pa dang / /kA raN+Da ba krung krung dang / /

rma bya ro ha Na rnams ni/ /gang zhig de lta bu mthong 'gyur/ /rmi lam bar ma'i dngos grub de/ /myur ba kho nar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ma 'am ra ha Na yang rung / /de bzhin pi wang thogs pa dang / /kuN+Da la sogs pa yang rung / /de bzhin a sogs d+hi mthong na/ /

gang yang rmi lam mthong byed pa/ /mi rnams tha ma'i dngos grub de/ /sgrol ma'i rtog par nges par bstan/ /gtum po khyi yi lag pa rnams/ /gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang / /bong bu rnga mo shing rta sogs/ /mthong dang rig pa nyid sogs sam/ /rgya skyegs til mar

gyis reg pa/ /gang gis rmi lam du 'jug pa/ /de yi dngos grub nges par gnas/ /dam tshig tsam du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de lta bu sogs yon tan ldan/ /rmi lam blo yis rnam dpyad nas/ /de ltar rab blo gang shes nas/ /slob ma de la rmi lam gyi/ /lung du yang

ni bstan par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/ /gal te khyim gnas gyur pa'am/ /dge slong dge slong ma dang ni/ /dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma yang rung / /chen po de rnams gso sbyong ni/ /bzung ste phyi nas slob ma rnams/ /gso sbyong yang dag gus par bya/ /

slob ma rmi lam mi dge ba/ /bstan bya sngon du sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/ /snga ma kho na ras dang ni/ /ras ris mthar ni a lA sa/ /zangs las 'byung bar ba zhugs te/ /yang dag 'jog par byed du gzhug /de nas dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la/ /tsan+dan

chu yis legs par byug /slob ma thams cad gnas cig tu/ /snying pos bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi yi gnas gcig tu/ /nyer 'dug dam tshig shes pa rnams/ /nang du rab tu gzhug par bya/ /de nas nyi ma nub dus su/ /dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya/ /

bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu ni/ /tshon sna lnga pa rtsa ba yi/ /snying po lan bdun bsngags byas te/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /phur bu de rnams srad bus bcings/ /de dag thams cad khru yi tshad/ /gsum byas srad bus yongs dkri bya/ /phyi nas

kun tu dung dang ni/ /rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang / /'khar rnga rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /'khar ba dang ni pheg rdob rnams/ /kun nas 'khrol bar byed du gzhug /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /phyi rol du ni dgram par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ /tshon sna lnga

pa'i thig skud kyis/ /khru brgyar byas nas thig gdab bya/ /de lam dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ste/ /de nas kha dog thams cad pa/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgyar bzlas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /

rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa yi/ /nyan thos dge 'dun rnams la ni/ /phyag byas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/ /rgyang grags lnga pa lhag gnas che/ /ral pa gcig pa'i snying po yis/ /gdug pa'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems ni bcing bar bya ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor

yang ni thams cad kyi/ /slob dpon gyi ni yo byad rnams/ /ral gcig snying po nyid kyis ni/ /thog mar bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /byang shar phyogs nas brtsams byas te/ /tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa zlos pa nyid/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris/ /

yongs su bcad cing lus dkar ba'i/ /slob de de bzhin gshegs rnams la/ /phyag bya rin chen phye mas so/ /pad+ma'i rigs la phyag byas te/ /phye ma ser pos bcom ldan ma/ /'phags ma sgrol ma phyag byas nas/ /ljang gu rnams kyis nyan thos kun/ /rang sangs rgyas kun phyag byas nas/ /

nag pos rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /de ltar dang pos dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi ba'i snying por ro/ /phyi nas gnyis la khru gnyis kyi tshad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa'o/ /gsum pa mtho gang pa de'i nyis 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thams cad du rim gyis bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor du bri bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad der rang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /'bru thams cad dang rin po che thams cad dang sman thams cad dang / dri dang me tog thams cad dang / tsan+dan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba/ mA Sha'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa/ du ku la'i ras

dkar pos mgrin pa bcings pa/ gser dang dngul las byung ba/ dkyil 'khor de'i yo byad thams cad ris gnyis pa'i mthar me tog gi phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba ste/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor

gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/ /de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig don dang bsod nams don/ /'dod don so sor dmigs byed du/ /sdom pa gzung bar byas gyur nas/ /gang du gnas pa thams cad nas/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bri bar bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub

thugs rje che/ /sangs rgyas byams pa spyan mar bcas/ /'di rnams ming ni kun drangs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal dkar mor grags/ /de bzhin du ni khro gnyer can/ /khros ma zhes ni grags pa ste/ /'di rnams ming ni kun dran

nas/ /spyan ras gzigs ni bri bar bya/ /rig pa mchog las slar 'jigs byed/ /rdo rje ser skya rdo rje ni/ /drag por bzhed dang seng ge dang / /de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur nyid/ /'di rnams ming ni kun nas ni/ /phyag na rdo rje kun tu bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon

gyis/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phye ma dkar po dang / yungs kar dkar po bsres pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kun tu 'phro ba/ gtsug tor nas 'od

zer 'byung bzhin pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam pa mchog thams cad dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa dang por bris shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi gzhogs gnyis su phye ma ser po dang / pad+ma ge sar phan tshun bsres pas gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams kun

nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs dang / cha byad dang / dbyibs kyi rnam pa can rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa/ sa bon gyis gang ba dang / 'bras bu phyag na bsnams pa la 'di lta ste/ bcom

ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / kun nas 'bar ba'i gtsug tor dang / gdugs dkar po dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / nor bu'i phung po dang / gser gyi phung po dang / rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang / kun nas phung po dang / nyon

mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phung po dang / rtag pa'i phung po dang / dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phung po dang / thams cad phung po dang / sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i phung po dang / 'jig rten gsum pa'i phung po dang / mtha'

yas phung po dang / bsod nams phung po dang / lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g.yas kyi gzhogs su nye bar bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yon du 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang /

mngon par mtho ba dang / sa'i 'dab ma dang / 'dab ma brgya pa dang / 'dab ma stong pa dang / 'od zer dang / 'od zer chen po dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i 'od zer dang / dkar po'i 'od zer dang / pad+ma'i 'od zer dang / bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang /

bdud bzhi'i rnam par 'dul ba'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gtsug tor zhes pa 'di rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa dang / lung bstan pa zhes gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'di rnams g.yon gyi steng du bri

bar bya'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i nye logs su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma spyan ma dang / mdzod spu dang / zla ba dang / snying rje ma dang / byams pa ma dang / mi 'jigs ma dang / lung bstan ma dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'khrugs pa rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i snying po zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ rang gi gzugs las rab tu snang ba'i sku

bri'o/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po khro bo'i gzugs can pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ rtse gsum dang zhags pas phyag brel ba/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gzugs brnyan la blta ba'o/ /gzhan du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi nye logs su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / phyi nas dge sbyong ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzes

ma dang / sangs rgyas dkar mo dang / de bzhin gshegs ma sems ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyus 'gugs ma zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /

'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten zhes pa 'di rnams kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin

gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po kun nas 'od pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ phyag na pad+ma ste/ de rnams thams cad lha'i gzugs g.yas pas sa

bon gyis gang ba dang / phyag g.yon pas mchog sbyin pa/ rang gi cha byad kyis kun tu gnas par yang ngo / /gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i steng du rang sangs rgyas brgyad ji ltar rig par bri bar bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das snyan grags zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang /

steng gi drang srong dang / drang srong chen po dang / lha'i drang srong dang / mA da ra dang / brtsegs pa dang / legs par brtsegs pa dang / brtsegs pa chen po zhes pa rang sangs rgyas brgyad po 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug pa/ ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bla gos ser po can no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon du snam sbyar ro/ /mdun gyi 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo rtsi bas bcu gnyis pa kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng

bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad pa la gnas pa'o/ /de'i yang nye logs su khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'i

'og tu pad+ma rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo bri bar bya'o/ /pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ dar la dang / ras kyi smad g.yogs dang stod g.yogs can/ thal mo sbyar ba byas pa cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs la lta bar gyur

pa/ bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/ /de'i gong du pad+ma chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo mdog dmar po kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal

po de rnams thams cad kun nas 'bar ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ dar dang ras kyi smad g.yogs can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus su bya'o/ /sgrol ma'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su byang chub sems dpa'

mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ dar la dang ras kyi smad g.yogs can/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin

pa'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par 'gro ba zhes bya ba pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang / pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i smad g.yogs dang /

dar la'i stod g.yogs 'chang ba/ shin tu dang ba'i sku/ 'od zer 'bar ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o/ /dri ma med pa 'gro ba'i steng gi g.yon du bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang

phreng dang / g.yang gzhi nag po can dang / rab tu dang ba'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'dod pa phun tshogs byed pa pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa sku dkar po pad+ma'i sdong bus dkris pa'i lus can/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dang / g.yas pas yid bzhin

gyi nor bu phyag tu bkod pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can/ phyag na rdo rje'i g.yas kyi snam bu gcig la rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bri bar bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog dang / nyal ba dang / legs par 'grub

par byed pa dang / rdo rje sde dang / dpung bzang dang / ral pa gyen brdzes dang / rig pa bzang po dang / legs 'grub dang / sde bzang dang / stobs po che dang / rnam par 'joms pa dang / ki lI ki la dang / mchog dang / legs 'dul dang / 'gro lding ba dang / sngon

rabs dang / rin chen ke lI dang / byis pa'i ke lI dang / legs par ke lI dang / legs par gang pa dang / gang ba chen po dang / lha mthar byed dang / rdo rje chen po dang / 'bar ba zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams sngags kyi rgyal po chen po ste/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas

'khrugs pa/ rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/ ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer du byas pa/ phyag g.yon pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa'o/ /'di dag gi 'og tu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste bcom

ldan 'das mA ma kI dang / rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang / rdo rje rgyal ma dang / rdo rje rnam par rgyal ma dang / dmar po ldan ma dang / grags ldan ma dang / bi shi ni rdo rje spyan ma dang / rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje khu tshur ma dang / rdo rje mi 'jigs ma

dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje sgra ldan ma dang / rdo rje dge legs ma dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje ma mo dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / rdo rje gnam lcags ma dang / dus kyi rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje gtsug phud ma dang / rdo rje bka' bsgo chen mo dang / rdo rje 'od dang / rgyal ba ldan ma dang /

rdo rje gzugs ldan ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams rdo rje'i rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ste/ rma bya la nye bar 'dug pa/ ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa cung zad bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan par byas pa dang / dar dang ras kyi sham

thabs dang / dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ g.yon pa rdo rje dang / g.yas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lhas bstod pa'i gzugs 'chang ba'o/ /de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ rang gi gzugs

dang cha byad dang dbyibs bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med dbus su bzhugs pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ dar la

dang ras kyi sham thabs can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i phyag rgya/ g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par byed pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byas pa'i lus can/ cung zad de

bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog can/ pad+ma'i gdan la rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ dar dang ras kyi sham thabs

can/ stod g.yogs dmar po mnabs pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ phyag g.yon pas rnga yab kyis brel ba/ 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i spyan cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o/ /spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen po pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs ma/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ cung zad 'dzum bzhin pa/ dar dang ras kyi sham thabs can/ stod g.yogs

dmar po mnabs pa/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pal yongs su bzung nas g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lus cung zad 'dud pa/ lang tsho dang po can/ ha cang mi sbom/ ha cang mi phra ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma bri bar bya'o/ /'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs kyi g.yas su phreng gcig la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bco brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag mtha' yas pa dang / phyag stong pa dang / phyag brgya pa dang / phyag bcu gnyis pa dang / phyag drug pa dang / phyag bzhi pa dang / zhabs

stong pa dang / zhabs brgya pa dang / zhabs bcu gnyis pa dang / zhabs drug pa dang / zhabs bzhi pa dang / rta mgrin dang / don yod zhags pa dang / 'od zer stong gis rnam par snang ba dang / mgrin pa dkar pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / mtha'
