bya rog dang 'ug pa'i sgo ngar bcug ste brag dang chu 'thab sar sgo nga sbas na 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbye ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni/ dug dang khrag dang ske tshe rnams mnyam par sbyar bas ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo phyi nang dang

bcas pa bris te/ dbus su hU~M swA mA ra ya hA phaT zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe nang ma la hU~M phaT hU~M/ phaT hU~M phaT/ hU~M phaT hU~M/ phaT hU~M phaT/ hU~M phaT hU~M/ phaT hU~M phaT/ hU~M phaT hU~M/ phaT hU~M phaT/ zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe phyi ma la hU~M oM phaT/ hU~M tA phaT/ hU~M re phaT/ hU~M tuta

phaT/ hU~M tA phaT/ hU~M re phaT/ hU~M tu phaT/ hU~M re phaT/ zhes bya ba bris te/ rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa la bris te sngags mang du bzlas nas dur khrod du sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gsad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas myos pa'i 'khor

lo ni da du ra'i chus ras sam sho gu la ling tshe dgu pa phyi nang du bcas pa bris te/ dbus su ha ha de ba da ta ta ha ha/ zhes bri'o/ /ling tshe nang ma la h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha/ zhes bri bar bya'o/ /phyi ma brgyad la/ h+ha oM h+ha/ h+ha tA h+ha/ h+ha re h+ha/ h+ha tu ta h+ha/ h+ha tA h+ha/ h+ha re h+ha/

h+ha tu h+ha/ h+ha re h+ha/ zhes bya ba bris te/ rtswa'i ga 'ur bcug nas bzlas pa ci nas kyang myur bar bya ste/ lam rgya gram du sbas te da du ra spungs na myos par 'gyur ro/ /gso na mar sbrang rtsi ba'i 'o mas ling ga bkrus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /myos byed kyi 'khor lo'i le'u

ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas mnan pa'i 'khor lo ni g.yam pa la ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris te/ yung ba'i chus ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus su ga swa staM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya b+ha ha zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe brgyad la/ ga oM ga /ga tA ga /ga re ga /ga tuta

ga /ga tA ga /ga re ga /ga tu ga /ga re ga /zhes bya ba bris te/ 'khor lo kha sbyar nas lam rgya gram du sbas na 'gul mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas mnan pa chen po ni yung ba'i khu bas snag tsha

byas te/ kham pa'i ga'u'i nang du phyi nang ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris te sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su rga swA staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya rga ha zhes bya ba bri'o/ /nang ma la ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ zhes bya ba brgyad bri'o/ /phyi rol gyi ling tshe brgyad la ni/ rga oM rga/ rga tArga/

rga re rga/ rga tuta rga/ rta tA rga/ rga re rga/ rga tu rga/ rga re rga/ zhes bya ba bris te/ bsgrub pa 'phags ma la byas la dgra gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs su sbas na bsrung bar 'gyur zhing dgra'i sgor sbas na mnan par 'gyur ro/ /dgra mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa

gsum pa'o// //de nas rig sngags kyi sbyor ba gnon par byed pa'i 'khor lo ni yung ba'i khu bas g.yam pa'am/ lhang tsher ma gnyis gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo bris te/ ling tshe dgu pa phyi nang dang bcas pa bri'o/ /sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su wa swA staM b+ha ya

staM b+ha ya hA/ 'khor lo nang ma la/ wa wa wa wa wa wa wa wa/ zhes bya ba bri'o/ /phyi ma la/ wa oM wa/ wa tA wa/ wa re wa/ wa tuta wa/ wa tA wa/ wa re wa/ wa tu wa/ wa re wa/ zhes bya ba bris te phan tshun g.yas g.yon du 'khor lo re re sbas na gnon

par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi sbyor ba gnon pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus me tog man dA ra ba dang pad+ma dang / ku mu da la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bcom ldan 'das la

gtor to/ /lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra du ma yang bsgrags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dam tshig kyang gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so so'i dam tshig sdom gnas te/ /lha yi

'khor lo dang ldan pas/ /srog chags dag ni gsad pa spangs/ /ma byin blang bar mi bya zhing / /bud med mi bsten smad mi bya/ /ni rnam pa kun tu spang / /myos 'gyur dag dang sha dag dang / /rku zhing rnam pa rtag tu spang / /mo rnams thams cad

kun la ni/ /chags pa'i sems ni spang ba ste/ /ma bzhin du ni kun la ni/ /phan pa'i sems kyis kun la bkur/ /dam tshig sdom la gnas pa yis/ /las rnams kun la mthu yod 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /dam tshig

dang sdom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / lha dang /

mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tshogs bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar

gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA b+haT+TA ri ka nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM/ bod skad du/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa

brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan yid 'ong po Ta la/ /sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras/ /sna tshogs ljon pa bkram pa ste/ /skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa/ /'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che/ /

sna tshogs 'khrugs pa ste/ /me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis/ /kun tu dri yis bkang ba ste/ /sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan/ /rkang pa drug pa glu yi sgra/ /mi'am ci ni glu snyan len/ /glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs/ /

rig 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /dri za rnams kyang glu len pa/ /thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang / /sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni/ /'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams/ /

rig pa'i rgyal mo stong rnams kyis/ /rtag tu legs par bsten pa'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i chogs gzhan dang / /rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba/ /sems can kun la phan par brtson/ /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs/ /bzhugs

te de phyir dpal dang ldan/ /pad+ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan/ /dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa/ /byams pa dang ni snying rjer ldan/ /lha yi 'khor ni chen po la/ /chos gsung bar ni yang dag bzhugs/ /de ru nyer 'dug yang dag langs/ /phyag na rdo rje

stobs po che/ /mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas/ /spyan ras gzigs la zhus pa ste/ /rkun po sbrul dang seng ge me/ /glang po stag dang chus 'jigs pas/ /zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying pa rnams/ /'khor

ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams/ /chags sdang gti mug dri ma las/ /gang gis sems can grol gyur pa/ /de gsungs bdag la thub chen po/ /'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs/ /dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs/ /phyag na rdo rje rab

rtogs byed/ /snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs/ /nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/ /skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi/ /smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste/ /nga yis 'jig rten ma ru shes/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba 'don par

brtson pa mo/ /nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/ /zla ba nya 'dra byad kyi 'od/ /lha bcas mi dang lha min rnams/ /'di rnams thams cad gsal bar byed/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/ /phyag na ut+pal sngon po bsnams/ /

ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma/ /bar snang du ni 'phar bar gnas/ /'gro ba yang dag bsrung don du/ /mtshon cha'i bskal pa byung ba dang / /'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bdag bskyed de/ /ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis kyang / /

sems can thams cad bdag gis bsrung / /sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral/ /des na bdag la 'jig rten du/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags/ /thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/ /spyan sngar

'dug ste 'di skad gsol/ /gus dang bcas pas yang dag gnas/ /gang zhig rgyal bas sngon bsgrags pa/ /gsungs shig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' ba/ /sdig pa spong byed bsod

nams dang / /bkra shis grags pa 'phel bar byed/ /gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid/ /nad rnams thams cad rlag byed pa/ /dpal ldan shis pa 'jog byed pa/ /nad med tshe ni 'phel bar byed/ /sems can rnams la byams

bsgoms nas/ /de dag sgrogs shig thub chen po/ /'di skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bzhad/ /phyogs rnams thams cad rab gzigs nas/ /'di lta bu yi byams pa spros/ /phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thabs

mdzad/ /bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /de gsungs shes rab shin tu che/ /legs so legs so dka' thub che/ /sems can kun la gcig tu brtse/ /skal ba chen po'i mi rnams nyon/ /mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrogs pa/ /nor gyi dbang phyug

yang dag 'gyur/ /nad rnams cad rnam par grol/ /dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan/ /dus min 'chi ba nges par 'joms/ /'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba/ /de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya/ /lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon/ /'di la rjes su

yi rang gis/ /legs par bsdams par 'gyur la bstod/ /oM dge ba can ni gzi brjid che/ /'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che/ /dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma/ /shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/ /gso byed ma dang rgyas byed ma/ /swA hA oM gyi rnam pa

'dod gzugs ma/ /sems can kun la phan par brtson/ /g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo/ /lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/ /'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/ /rdza rnga dung can rgyas pa mo/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma/ /zla ba'i gdong can dkar

mo che/ /mi pham gos ni ser mo can/ /sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che/ /stobs po che la pha rol phyin/ /rtsub mo chen mo gtub chen mo/ /sdang ba'i sems can rlag byed ma/ /rab tu zhi ba zhi ba'i gzugs/ /rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od/ /glog gi phreng ba'i rgyal

mtshan can/ /ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon/ /'tshol byed rengs byed nag mo che/ /mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma/ /srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo/ /mdzes ma dge ma dra ba'i lding / /tshangs pa mo dang rig byed ma/ /gsad pa mo ni brag phug gnas/ /

bkra shis don byed zhi ba mo/ /skye gnas rig byed yid mgyogs ma/ /thod pa can ni shugs chen mo/ /tshangs ma bde ma gzhan mi rgyal/ /ded dpon chen po snying rje gnas/ /chud zos lam ni rab ston ma/ /mchog ster ston byed ston pa mo/ /bud med gzugs

la dpag med gnon/ /ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /grub ma gtum mo bdud rtsi ma/ /des ma nor sbyin bsod nams ma/ /skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma/ /mthar byed skrag byed 'jigs byed ma/ /drag dang brtul zhugs chen mo ma/ /'gro la gcig

tu phan par brtson/ /skyabs byed gus la gsong po ma/ /ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma/ /rtag par kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma/ /don kun grub byed bzang po ma/ /gsad byed gso byed nor ster ma/ /mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag

nyid skyes/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /phan par byed par grags pa ste/ /mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba mo/ /lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba'i/ /skal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed/ /dug ni thams cad nyams byed pa/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi byed ma/ /

sems can kun la bde ster ma/ /blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog /mnyam gzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis/ /des ni dus mi ring ba ru/ /rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu sdug pa bde bar 'gyur/ /bkren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o/ /rmongs

pa shes rab chen por 'gyur/ /yid gzhungs 'gyur bar the tsom med/ /bcings pa 'ching las grol bar 'gyur/ /tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /dgra bo bshes por 'gyur ba'o/ /rwa can dang ni mche ba can/ /dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' ba/ /sna tshogs

'jigs pa 'khrugs pa las/ /mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis/ /'jigs pa kun las grol bar byed/ /dus min 'chi las grol byed pa/ /skyes bu snyan pa thob par 'gyur/ /mir ni skye ba don dang bcas/ /de gcig pu yi phan yon gyis/ /

gang zhig 'dir ni sngar langs nas/ /skyes bu gang zhig sgrogs byed pa/ /de ni dus ring tshe dang ldan/ /mi yi dpal ni dga' 'gyur te/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za dang ni lus srul po/ /'byung po gshed byed srin po dang / /ma mo rtsub pa'i

sems ldan pa/ /gnod sbyin mo dang byed/ /smyo byed dang ni gnod byed rnams/ /grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang / /sha za la ni sogs pa rnams/ /ro langs sna tshogs la sogs dang / /skul byed ma dang sems sdang rnams/ /grib ma

la yang 'gom mi byed/ /ji ltar slar ni mchod par 'gyur/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'ching bar byed/ /nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur/ /phyug cing longs spyod yon tan ldan/ /bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rigs dang ldan zhing mthong dgar

'gyur/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba/ /blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems kyis yang dag brgyan/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa der/ /rtag

tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong / /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ tA ra de bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka na/

bod skad du/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi gshal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa/ oM trai lo kya bi dza ya/ a tsit+ta dzA ya/ a ni ra tsi dza tA ya/ su dzA ya/ bi dzA ya/ ma hA dzA ya/ bi dzA ya/ dza ya dza ya/ he he/ sma ra sma ra/ ba ra ba ra/ bar da/ ma hA de bi/

bi la sa/ bi la sa/ bi la sa/ ba dza a mo ta ka ri bi dza ya de bi/ hI hI/ ki ni ki ni pi lam ba se/ sma ra sma ra/ ma hA pra dz+nyA a ni ba ta/ badzra ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka /b+ha gi ni hrUM hrUM/ s+phuT s+phuT/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ kaM pa

kaM pa/ kaM pa ya/ su ra b+hi gan+d+ha/ a ti si ta/ mu khe ha la da ba la/ saM ga rA dza na/ bi ma bi gi /bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ he b+ha ga ba ti/ san+t+ra sa ya/ bi g+ha nA na/ pa ri ba lA ya/ a smA kaM a smA kaM/ mA da ni mA da ni/ saM bo d+ha ya/ saM mo ha ya/ ha ra ha ra/ hi ri

hi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bi ta ka ra/ ba ra dza/ haM haM/ tro tA ya/ haM haM/ san+t+ra tA ya/ san+t+ro ya/ man+ta man+ta/ maR+da maR+da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra saM tsa ra/ be ga be ga be ga ba ti/ na mo na mo na maHswA hA/ de nas lha dang lha min tshogs/ /srin po gnod sbyin mi'am ci/ /lto

'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang / /'byung po dri za log 'dren rnams/ /'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog /gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas/ /skrag cing mgo bo smad gyur te/ /lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas/ /gang gis 'di nas sa gsum

'di/ /mtha' dag khyab par byas pa'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i lha yi ngag bzlog pa/ /sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs smos pa/ /che ba nyid kyi grags pa 'od/ /spyan yangs khyod ni sems can rnams/ /phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba

lags/ /de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa/ /lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang / /rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang / /de bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te/ /bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang / /pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du/ /

btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni/ /phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yi/ /dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi/ /bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba/ /skye dgu'i dbang phyug mngon

shes myur/ /dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag /rgod bag med cing dregs pa med/ /pad+ma'i spyan dang pad+ma'i zhal/ /pad+ma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin/ /spyan bzang spyan ni yangs pa ste/ /sngo ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od/ /skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin/ /de

bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa/ /mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste/ /dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma/ /sgros dmar sen mo dmar ba ste/ /spyan rtsa dmar pos gzigs par mdzad/ /dga' mdzad dga' stobs pad+ma lags/ /pad+ma'i mdog can

pad mdog dgyes/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste/ /'jigs pa'i cha lugs stobs mo che/ /'dul du 'chug ma 'dul mdzad ma/ /bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa lags/ /rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can/ /rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba/ /byang

chub rdul med dri ma med/ /zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rjed/ /sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar/ /rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes/ /chu lha g.yul 'gyed 'gying bag can/ /skyes mchog rang bzhin yid 'phros rgyas/ /gtsug phud gsum po lto tshil gsum/ /spyan

gsum dri ma gsum sel ba/ /srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba/ /tshig ldan mar yang de bzhin grags/ /rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin/ /sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med/ /nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi ba ma/ /gzugs bzang phyal bzang nu ma bzang / /

sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul/ /dul ba bsrung pa rdul sel ba/ /phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma/ /rgyags pa sbyin ma dregs spong ma/ /drag mo lags te gzi bskyed ma/ /dkar mo zhi mdzad bde ba mo/ /skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan/ /

tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags/ /zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal/ /zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad/ /nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog dgyes pa mo/ /yid 'ong bzang zhing zhi ba mo/ /bde ba bde ldan mu dang stegs/ /bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma/ /

nor spel bsod nams rnam par rgyal/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo gser dngul 'od/ /'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin/ /sgrol ma lags te zla ba'i zhal/ /sems can kun la med mi 'gyur/ /mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma/ /cha lugs sngo ba cha

lugs bzang / /rgyan dmar rgyan du thogs pa ste/ /na bza' gser mnabs gang ga ma/ /dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par gzigs/ /gi'u wang gi thig le spos/ /'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid/ /dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma/ /tshems

dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum/ /dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub 'khor thogs/ /do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can/ /'og pag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma/ /grogs ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs/ /nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang / /nor bu'i rgyan rnams rgyan du

thogs/ /nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/ /'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can/ /skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad/ /zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can/ /tshangs pa'i shugs can rlung dang ldan/ /bud med lags te mkha'

las gshegs/ /lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phrog ma/ /'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul/ /'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma/ /drag po thor tshugs gtsug pud can/ /tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsung ldan rgyal/ /bing ka'i skad 'dra pheg bzang ma/ /'jig rten dbang

phyug rigs mchog skyes/ /dbyig pa'i shing lo rdo rje thogs/ /drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan/ /gshegs na snyan cha dri med g.yo/ /gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug /rig sngags 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma/ /stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mdzad/ /stobs

dang stobs med mnga' ba ste/ /shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad/ /sgyu rtsal lags te sgyu rtsal ldan/ /de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags/ /steng nas khyams dang khyams bzang tshul/ /tsam pa ka yi chun pos gsal/ /ser mo tsan

pa legs pa'i rten/ /drag mo phyag na chun po thogs/ /skal ba bzang mo gshal ka can/ /de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyes/ /rigs mtshan shin tu stobs dang ldan/ /rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma/ /bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thabs/ /blo mdzad

shes rab skyed par mdzad/ /lha mo lam me cod pan can/ /lha rnams kun las tshul lhag pa/ /sred med bu mo sdig pa sel/ /bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes/ /rab tu dga' ma 'grogs na dga'/ /spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan/ /dga'

ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste/ /chos rnams kun gyi legs pa'i rten/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa sbrul mdzad ma/ /nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste/ /las dang nyon mongs rab 'joms shing / /'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma/ /shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas

pa/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa/ /stobs rnams bcu bos cher gsal ma/ /rdo rje cod pan rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje phra mo lha min sel/ /dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bde dang dpal/ /rdo rje zhags pa zhags

ba bzang / /sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams/ /yid 'ong yid la tshim par mdzad/ /pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma/ /tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste/ /rol cing gar thabs ston par mdzad/ /chos can ha la ha la'i 'od/ /chos sbyin rnam par gzigs

pa lags/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang / /bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste/ /rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che/ /lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod/ /kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni/ /smra ba

rnams kyi mchog lags gsung / /de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi/ /lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can/ /'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa/ /dbang phyug chen po la sogs kun/ /nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis/ /thams cad rtag tu

mthun par ni/ /stobs bcu dag la brtson par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang / /dus kun tu ni bsrung bar gyis/ /zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing / /'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa/ /rgal dka'

khyed kyis rgal bar gyis/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la/ /dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis/ /de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi/ /phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i zhal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra/ /'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma rig

sngags sgrol ma'i mchog /mun pa sel bar byed pa dang / /mthu stobs rgya chen skyed byed pa/ /sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa/ /tshogs rnams skyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /dag par byas pa ma yin pas/ /shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi/ /gzungs

'di thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i/ /brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la/ /dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms shing / /sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa/ /

sems can thams cad rab 'byed pa'i/ /gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa/ /su zhig mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /nyan tam 'chang ngam klog byed na/ /rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin/ /de yi don kun grub par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs kun las rnam grol

zhing / /sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog /'jig rten dag tu chos shes la/ /'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs/ /su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /'don zhing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal/ /de bzhin stod byed de dag ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob

par 'gyur/ /de yi don kyang grub 'gyur zhing / /rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi/ /gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang / /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di/ /'jig

rten dag na rgyags pa dang / /nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o/ /de nas bdud ris gyen du g.yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba/ /'od gsal lha dang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po/ /

rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyab par stobs kyis brten pa yis/ /gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la/ /don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pa gang / /rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang / /de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas/ /bzod med

nyon mongs sel ba dang / /zhi ba'i yid ni skyed pa'i tshig /rgyal ba'i mchog gis bka' stsal nas/ /gzhes par gyur te mi gsung bzhugs/ /de nas sgrol mchog lha mos gtsor gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la/ /dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang bde

sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas/ /lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dga' bas rgyas shing rmad byung nas/ /rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar gyur/ /sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs

so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA wa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+ta re tu re sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TaM ma ma kr-i te dzaM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/

phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA swa pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas ba ces bya ba'i gzungs/

'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tA rA yai/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ sa ma yas+thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarbA b+ha ra Na/ bi b+hU Shi te/ pad+ma ni pad+ma/ ma hA pad+ma/ A sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ trai lo kya

ba ra de/ sarba de ba dA na pa/ bU dzi te sma dA hi/ b+ha ga ba ti tA re/ sma rA hI/ b+ha ga bAM ta/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ pu ra taHsa ma yaM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka ni ka/ bi tsi trA b+ha ra Ne/ oM bi lo kA ya/ che ge mo/ b+ha ga ba te tA re/ hrIM hrIM hrIM phaT srA hA/

gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dkar po'i tshes brgyad dam lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen

po byas te/ sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam du bzlas par bya'o/ /gang 'dod pa de sbyin no/ /mchog thams cad ster ro/ /ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so/ /gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje

mchog gi rgyud las btus/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra aSh+Ta g+ho re tA sbI sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo/

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi steng lha'i gnas na bzhugs te/ de

nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo sgrol mas 'di skad ces smras so/ /mtho ris rin chen lta bu 'di thob nas/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu shes par byos/ /bzang po sten cing ngan pa spang bar gyis/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams spyod byed pa/ /'jig

rten pha rol thur du 'bab 'gyur te/ /dud 'gro glen lkugs gcig la gcig za dang / /gyen thur 'bab 'dzeg g.yang sa ngal ba'i lam/ /'jigs shing dngangs skrag shin tu skyi g.ya' ba/ /zon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /

ltogs shing skom dang lus mi 'tsham/ /bza' btung snang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang / /kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur/ /ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni/ /rang

dbang med par gshin rje gdug pas khrid/ /bsregs shing btsos ti mtshon gyis rab tu 'thub/ /bsran glags med pa'i sdug bsngal tsha dang grang / /des na tshe 'dir sdig pa'i las byed pa/ /rang gis rang la mngan ni cher byas yin/ /bskal pa mang por sdug

bsngal drag pos gdungs/ /thar pa'i dus med bsran pa'i glags kyang med/ /dran pa gsal bas las kyi 'bras bur shes/ /sdug bsngal ma bzod smre sngags rang la rmo/ /skad ngan drag po'i ku sgras gzhan yang skrag /de la sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi

khyab/ /gang dag nyes dmigs rab tu shes gyis la/ /ngan song gsum gyi rgyu rnams rab tu spangs/ /sdig pa'i rnam pa phra rags gang la yang / /lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas spyad ta re/ /rang yang bde la 'gro rnams yongs la phan/ /chags sdang rmongs spangs snying

rje'i rtsa ba brtan/ /sgo gsum dang bas 'bad de dge ba spyad/ /shin tu zab pa'i snying po 'di la 'bad/ /me tog sad kyis khyer ba'i 'bras bu la/ /so nam byas kyang myu gu mi skye ltar/ /sdom nyams the tshom zos pa'i gang zag gis/ /shin tu zab pa'i rig sngags

bsgrub gyur kyang / /byin brlabs 'byung ngo snyam yang 'byung mi srid/ /rtsol ba de dag ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /rig sngags de yang skye bo'i tshig dang mtshungs/ /ting 'dzin rnams kyang byis pa'i bsam pa 'dra/ /skyon med skyes bus rig sngags de bsgrubs na/ /ji ltar

'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub/ /dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi sa bon ni/ /shin tu phra yang chu lud legs bran na/ /dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam du skye/ /bems po phyi yi 'gyur yang de 'dra na/ /rig pas rig pa bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ /'od gsal nang gi 'gyur la dpag tu

med/ /tshong dpon lam la mkhas pa dag la brten/ /gru tshags legs pas rgya mtshor zhugs gyur na/ /rin chen 'dod pa bzhin du rnyed gyur nas/ /rang gi gnas su legs par phyin pa yin/ /byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms rten/ /byang

chub sems ldan dge ba sbyang gyur na/ /yang dag rdzogs kyi lam la zhugs 'gyur te/ /nges par mkhyen nyid sa la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mda' nyid skyes bu'i 'theb nas shor gyur na/ /mi 'phang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur/ /chos nyid don kun

chub pa'i gang zag ni/ /mi phyin snyam yang pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /bya cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par the tsom med/ /chos nyid rnam par dag pa de rtogs na/ /bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med/ /las med

de yi rnam par smin pa med/ /mtha' rnams rab spangs skyes bu rnam par grol/ /de don rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa yi/ /snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi sdig kyang 'dzad/ /ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal

kun/ /rab tu sbyong zhing sgrib pa rnams kyang 'dag /don dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di lta ste/ /oM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo/ lha mo khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol/ /oM na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA

ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TA na/ pra duSh+TA na ma ma kr-i te/ dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ ma ma Ar+yA ba lo b+ha yA na rA/ bo d+hi satwA/ ma hA satwA ni/ ad+hi Sh+ThI te ma ma sarba karma A ba ra Na swa b+hA ba/ shud d+he

bi shu da d+he/ sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis su/ /lha mo nyid la rab tu bstod/ /thugs rje shin tu che bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs shing rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /shin tu mdzes tshul 'dzum

zhing bzhad pa'i bzhin/ /spyan gyi skye mched zar ma'i pad+ma 'dra/ /snyan gyi skye mched ug cos bye ba 'dra/ /shangs kyi skye mched ut+pal bum bu 'dra/ /zhal gyi mched ha lo rgyas pa 'dra/ /sna tshogs sku mnga' na chung mtshan ldan sku/ /chos kyi sgra sgrogs ka la ping

ka'i gsung / /sems can kun la byams mgon thugs rje'i thugs/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma g.yon/ /sems can don rnams mdzad phyir skyabs sbyin g.yas/ /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma la ni skyabs

su mchi/ /'khor ba'i g.yang sa che las bdag skyobs shig /'gro drug rang kha'i gnas su 'khor ra re/ /thugs rje chen mo'i zhags pas bdag zung shig /ngan song gsum gyi gnas su shor ra re/ /'khyams med pa yi lam du bdag chug shig /log par

lta ba'i rigs su skyes sa re/ /bla ma byang sems mnga' dang bdag sprod cig /bshes gnyen ngan pa dag dang phrad ta re'o/ /seng ge glang chen me dang sbrul/ /mi rgod chu dang rims rnams dang / /sha zas 'jigs pa brgyad po las/ /skyob mdzad khyed la phyag

'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /'jigs pa brgyad las bskyab tu gsol/ /pha rol 'bras bu ma thob bar dag tu/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang / /stobs dang de

bzhin ye shes pha rol phyin/ /bcu po de dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos 'di bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton dang / kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par

bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya o ba tI d+hA ra NI/ bod skad

du/ 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa re ma hA dz+wa re/ du khe muk+ti su saM pan+ne/ ma hA saM pan+ne/

saM pat+ti/ ma hA saM pat+ti/ ka se ma hA ka se/ kats+tsha dz+wa ra mug+te si swA hA/ skud pa'am chu la lan gsum sngags na rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/

rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra swA hA/ gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'am skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du sngags te mdud pa gsum bor la bcings na bar du gcod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA

ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ ni gi le swA hA/ 'bru mar la lan gsum sngags te bskus na skran 'tsho'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ bi sa re bi sa re/

sa ra nA sha ni swA hA/ shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni si re ni si re/ ka la mi mi re/ ka la ri tsi rI/ pa tsi le swA hA/ lpa ba dang / lkog ma'i

lha gor na ba dang / lce kyi ba na ba dang / gdon nad thams cad la 'ji ba la lan gsum du sngags te bskus na phan no/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ badzra pA Nid+h+ya ma/ oM oM krA rA pra b+ha be/ b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+he/ pra ti bud+d+he/ ud+d+he/ shAn+ti ka ri/ ha na ha na/

ma ma pA pa maM/ da ha da ha/ ma ma pA pa daM/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ma pA pa kaM/ oM o De/ gra sa gra sa/ ri te De ri te De/ shAn+tiM ka rI ye swA hA/ shu b+ha ka rI ye swA hA/ k+She ma ka ri ya swA hA/ rims nad kyis btab pa la bya ba pa byas na rims nad sos par 'gyur ro/ /

sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro/ /zas la sngags kyis btab ste zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te bcings na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /

'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ha ya grI ba d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya grI ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba satwe b+h+yaH sa nA ga ti ne/ na maHsarba satwa b+h+yaHsa na/ a pa ha ri Ni/ na maHsarba satwa b+ha yot+ta ra NA ya/

na maHsar+b+ba b+ha ba/ pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwa bo d+hi tsi ki ta saM ka rA ya/ na maHsarba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba duHkha pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba an+d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba bid+yA rA dza/ pa sha prA p+ta ye/ ma hA yo ga yo gI shwa rA ya/ ta

s+ya na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khong+gI r+NaM r-i Shi bi da dA/ de ba nA ga /yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ shAkya prah+mA/ lo ka pA la/ biSh+tu ma he shwa ra/ nA rA yA Na/ skan+d+ha/ ku be ra/ a su ren+d+ra/ ma tr-i ga Na/ na maHkr-i taM/ badzra khur sa hi yaM/ ha ya grI ba brah+ma/ pa ra ma hr-i da ya mA

brta yiSh+Ta mi/ a ba pra me yAr+ha sa d+ha ka na/ a ba h+yaM/ sarba b+hU tA nAM/ sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kaM/ a mo g+haM/ sarba karma NaM/ bi shA na ny+tsa/ bi nA ya kaM /tad+ya thA/ oM ta ru la ta ru la ta ru la/ bi ta ru la bi ta ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+ha ta ka /sarba b+hU ta bi dra ba ka dz+wa li ta/ a na la/ bi s+phu lang+gi/ aT+Ta

hA sa/ ke sa ra/ a ta bA/ pra bi ta ka /yaM badzra khu ra ni ra ga ti ta/ tsa li ta bA su dA ta la/ badzrod shwa si ta/ hA si ta ma ru to k+Sha ti/ pra sha man ka ra/ pa ra duSh+Ta big+h+NAM/ sam b+ha k+Sha Na ka ra/ swa bid+d+ho pa de sha ka ra/ pa ra ma shAn+ti ka ra/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ b+ho d+ha ya mi te/

b+ha ga bAM ha ya grI ba/ sarba bid+yA hr-i da ya mA baR+ta yi Sh+yA mi/ khA da khA da/ ma hA rau dra/ man+t+ra na/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ A t+ma swa hi tA na/ man+t+ra na/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ sarba karme Shu me/ sid+d+he/ de hi de hi/ A bi sha A bi sha /pra bi sha pra bi sha /sarba gra he Shu/ a pra ti ha ta/ d+hu na d+hu na/

bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ sarba ba ro pa gra ma/ kr-i t+ya ka kho rdo du rlaM gri ta/ mu shi ka /bi sha ka ra bi sha daMSh+Ta bi Sha cU r+Na yo a b+hi tsA ra bi sha ka ra Na/ sid+d+ha any+dza na/ tsak+Shur mo ha na/ tsit+ta bA k+She pa na ka ra/ ni t+ya/ a pa ra pre k+Sha Na/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ma hA

bod+hi sa twa rid+d+h+ya daMSh+Ta Ne na/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsatwA nAM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ma bud+d+ha/ d+harma saM g+ha/ a nu dz+nyA taM/ me karma shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru/ phaT/ ha ya grI ba phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ badzra daM Sh+T+ro t+ka Ta/ b+ha ya b+hi ra bA ya phaT/ bar maM trA na/ nA sha na ka rA ya phaT/ pa ra duSh+Ta big+h+nAM/ baM b+hak+Sha Na ka

rA ya phaT/ sarba gra hot+sA d+ha na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba gra he Shu a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ pa Ta la mu lA ya phaT/ ye ko tsi ta/ ma ma a hi te Shi na/ ka ye kra min+ti/ man+ta yan+t+ra/ ya mAn+ti/ dzu hwan ti kA khordi kurba n+ti ta na sarba na ba da mi khe na/ bA kri tA ya phaT/ na maHsarba duSh+Ta gra ho t+sA+e d+ha na ya/ ha

ya grI bA ya/ sid+d+h+yanu man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/ oM a mr-i tod+b+ha bA ya hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM na mo ha yA ya swA hA/ oM na mo bi shwa mUrta ye swA hA/ na maHsarba satwA nI sid+d+hA n+tu/ man+t+ra pa dA ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya grI ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi dza ya ba ti nA ma pra t+yaM gi rA/ bod skad du/ phyir zlog pa 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad srung ba la mngon par brtson pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen

po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyir zlog pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba gshed byed dang byad sel ba/ ro langs dang bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /

chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa dang / dang / sha za dang / grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa dang / srul po'i

'jigs pa dang / lus srul po'i 'jigs pa dang / lam log pa dang / lam du zhugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i 'gro ba so so'i 'jigs pa rmugs par byed pa/ rengs par byed pa/ rmongs par byed pa/ mdog bzang por byed pa/ spro

ba yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad yang dag par byang bar byed pa/ kha rmugs par byed pa/ kha rengs par byed pa/ bzhin mdzes par byed pa brjod par bya'o/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag grub par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri

si ri si ri/ si ri/ su ru su ru/ su ru su ru/ su ru su ru/ su ru/ ma ra ma ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru/ bdag nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du

gsol/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ hu lu/ ki li ki li/ ki li ki li/ ki li ki li/ ki li ki li/ ki li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li/

tsi li tsi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog par mdzad du gsol/ oM bi sa ra bi sa ra/ kaM pa kaM pa/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ dgra gang dag bdag la mi phan par

'dod pa dang / rnam par sngang ba dang / gnod par sems pa dang / sngags byed pa dang / sbyin sreg byed pa dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / byas pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad nyid la slar song shig swA hA/ mi mdza' ba thams cad kyi mig bcing ngo / /

rna ba bcing ngo / /sna bcing ngo / /lce bcing ngo / /lus bcing ngo / /yid bcing ngo / /yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcing ngo / /s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya spo Ta ya/ gshed byed dang byad thams cad rnam par bsal du gsol/ /rnam par gzhom

du gsol/ /rnam par gzhig tu gsol/ sarba sha trUM/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / brjed byed thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung

du gsol swA hA/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad bsal du gsol/ bsal du gsol/ tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/ ma ra ma ra swA hA/ si ri si ri swA hA/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru swA hA/ mi gang dag gnod par 'dod la/ phan par

mi 'dod cing bdag la lta ba thams cad rmugs par bgyi'o/ /rengs par bgyi'o/ /'khrugs par bgyi'o/ /rmongs par bgyi'o/ /'byung po thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad 'khrul par mdzad ma/ rmongs par mdzad ma/

rmugs par mdzad ma/ rengs par mdzad ma/ 'jigs par mdzad ma/ rnam par 'jigs par mdzad ma/ rnam par 'thor bar mdzad ma/ rnam par 'joms par mdzad ma swA hA/ nI le nI le/ nI la ke she swA hA/ pI te pI te/ pI ta ke she swA hA/ lo hi te lo hi te/ lo hi

ta ke she swA hA/ a ba da te/ a ba da te/ a ba dA ta ke she swA hA/ shwe te shwe te shwe ta ba s+t+ra d+hA ra Ni ye swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad la dbang sgyur ma/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad bsal du gsol/ swA hA/ 'phel bar mdzad ma/ bdag gi dpal dang skal ba bzang po

thams cad spel du gsol/ 'phel bar mdzad gsol/ swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / gshed byed thams cad dang / byad thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang /

sdig pa thams cad dang / /bza' nyes dang / bsgom nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod ltas thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ swA hA/ phyir zlog rnam par rgyal ba can/ rgyal ba 'byung ba gsungs pa 'di/ /gang gi mgul du 'di

btags pa/ /des ni rgyal 'gyur the tsom med/ /sdig dang rmi ngan bkra mi shis/ /rgyal po me dang chom rkun dgra/ /de dag rnams kyis de mi tshugs/ /gang gi mgul du 'di btags pa/ /de ni chu yis khyer mi 'gyur/ /sdig pa yang dag byang bar 'gyur/ /

dge ba rnams ni rtag tu 'phel/ /nad med pa yang thob par 'gyur/ /phyir zlog pa 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ @#/ /'phags pa par+N+Na sha ba ri'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bA ma ne twaM na ma s+yA mi twaM na ma s+yA mi bA ma ne/ b+ha ga ba te pi shA tsi/ par+N+Na sha ba ri/ bi shA tsi pA sha paR+shu d+hA ri NI/ yA ni kA ni tsid b+ha yA n+yu ta pa d+yaM te/ yaHkA tsid mA ra yo/ yaHkA tsid ma hA mA ra yo/ ye ke na tsid u pa dra bAH/ ye

ke tsid u pA yA sA/ ye ke tsid ad+h+yAt+mi kA b+ha yA/ ye ke tsid u pa sar+g+ga saM bad d+ha bA/ ut+pa d+ya na te/ sarbA ni tA ni/ sarba sta/ sarba te bA la tA/ e bo ta pa d+yan+te/ na paN+Di ta taH/ ta da ne na sa t+ye na sa t+ya ba tsa ne na sa t+ya pA ke na/ tad+ya thA/ oM dzaHdzAHdzaHdzAHe b+hi

ShaH paN+DI ta a d+hiSh+Thi tai ra man+t+ra pa dai ra/ ma ma sarba satwA nA na tsa/ rak+ShaM ku ru pa ri trA NaM ku ru/ pa ri gra haM ku ru/ pa ri pA la naM ku ru/ shAn+tiM ku ru swa s+t+ya ya naM ku ru/ daN+Da pa ri hA raM ku ru/ sha s+t+ra pa ri hA raM ku ru/ yA bad ba Shi d+hu Sha NaM ku ru/ ag ni pa ri hA raM ku ru/ u da ka

pa ri hA raM ku ru/ ka kho re da ts+tshe da naM ku ru/ sI mAM ban+d+haM ku ru/ d+ha ra NI ban+d+haM ku ru/ tad+ya thA/ a mi te a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a swa te/ a swa s+t+yaM ge /mA ma ra mA ma ra/ mA sa ra mA sa ra/ sha ma pra sha ma/ u pa sa ma sarba bya d+hI nu pa sa ma sarba

a kA la mr-i t+yu nu pa sa ma sarba nak+Sha tra gra ha do ShA nu pa sa ma/ sarba diSh+T+rI NAM/ tso sa sa ma/ b+ha ga ba ti/ par+N+Na sha ba ri/ t+yuM na t+yuM na/ bi t+yuM na bi t+yuM na/ tu na tu na tu mu le swA hA/ oM gau re gan+d+ha ri tsau rI tsaN+DA li mA taM gi /puk+kA sI swA hA/ na maHsarba sha ba rA NAM/ ma hA sha ba rA NAM/ b+ha ga ba ti pi

shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ oM pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri hrIHdzaHhU~M phaT pi shA tsi swA hA/ oM aM ku re/ maM ku re ku ra re par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ gnag nad la srad bu byas te/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad du mdud de/ sngags kyi snying po bris pa'i snod dang bcas pas bzlas

ba tshul bzhin du byas la/ de'i rjes la nad pa'am/ rta dang ba lang la sogs pa la spos chus bkrus nas khyu mchog kyang bkrus te de'i mgo la bcing na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ma he dang / ra lug rnams la gnod pa byung ba la yang lhas su bri bar

bya'o/ /bum pa chu gtsang mas bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags nas bkrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /snga dro phyugs kyi lhas su song la dri dang me tog gi gtor ma byas te/ bum pa sar pa ma spyad pa chus bkang la brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags te/ phyugs lhas kyi sgor rta babs

gzugs shing / rta babs de la chu shing gi lo ma la rig pa gi'u wang gis bris te/ rta babs kyi khar gdags so/ /de nas phyugs thams cad gzas la song ba rta babs kyi sgo de nas gzud do/ /gzhan yang bum pa bzhi chus bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags

nas mi bzhis chus gtor na phyugs nad med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du zhag bdun du byas na dad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang / phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te/ mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so/ /stag gi 'jigs pa la

dril bu la bzlas nas dkrol bar bya'o/ /chu srin gyi 'jigs pa la mnga' dang / pha gu la sngags na sbrul dang / byi ba dang / sdig pa la sogs pa rnams kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul ngor thal ba la sngags te/ spyi bo dang mgul du byugs na mtshon

cha zlog par byed do/ /skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas nad pa'i khri la bcing ngo / /bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags pas khrus bya'o/ /lag pa'i skud pa la bzlas nas bcing ngo / /de nas bde bar 'gyur ro/ /yul bskor te dril bu dang /

rnga dang / dung la bzlas pa byas na bgegs thams cad 'byer te gnod pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dpa' bo'i dpral bar rig pa'i mdongs gzhag la mtshon cha bskur na dgra'am g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa par+N+Na sha ba ri'i mdo rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya par+N+Na sha ba ri nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma mi'u thung sha za mo ri khrod lo ma gyon ma dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa gang dag ci byung ba de dag thams cad dang yams kyi nad gang ci 'byung

yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed chen po gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / khong du gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / gang dag ci byung pa de dag

thams cad ni byis pa kho na la 'byung gi mkhas pa la ni ma yin no/ /bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i ngag gis song shig /dengs shig /mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad la

bsrung bar mdzod cig /yongs su bskyab par mdzod cig /yongs su gzung bar mdzod cig /yongs su bskyang bar mdzod cig /zhi ba dang bde legs su mdzod cig /chad pa spang bar mdzod cig /mtshon cha spang par mdzod cig /ri srid dug gzhom

pa'i bar du mdzod cig /me'i gnod pa spang bar mdzod cig /chu'i gnod pa spang bar mdzod cig /byang stems gcad par mdzod cig /mtshams bcing bar mdzod cig /sa gzhi bcing bar mdzod cig /tad+ya thA/ a mr-i te a mr-i te/ a mr-i ta ud b+ha be/

a mr-i ta saM b+ha be/ A shwa ste/ A shwa staM ge /mA ma ra mA ma ra/ mA sa ra mA sa ra zhi bar mdzod/ nad thams cad nye bar mdzod/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi nyes pa thams cad

nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ mche ba'i dug thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ /bcom ldan 'das ma ri khrod lo ma can/ tun+na tun+na/ bi tun+na bi tun+na/ tu Na tu Na/ tu mu le swA hA/ oM gau re/ gan d+hA ri/ tsaN+DA li/ mA taM gi /puk+ka si swA hA/ oM aM ku re/ mAM ku re/ ku

ra re/ par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ na maHsarba sha ba rI NAM/ ma hA sha ba rI NAM/ b+ha ga ba ti pi shA tse/ par+N+Na sha ba ri pi shA tsi swA hA/ oM pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri hrIHdzaHhUM phaT pi shA tsi swA hA/ 'phags ma ri khrod ma lo ma gyon ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba la ba tI nA ma pra t+yaM gi rA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems

can thams cad la snying brtse ba can/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung po thams cad 'gog pa/ rims nad thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad 'gog pa/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gdon dang / 'byung po'i

gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad 'joms pa/ mi mdza' ba thams cad so sor rengs par byed pa/ tshe skyong ba srog skyong ba'i phyir bzlog pa 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki te/ a ba lo ki te/ saM b+ha be/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/

ba ra ba ra ba ra/ kA le kA le kA le/ ma hA kA la/ a ba lo ki ta/ pra sA d+ha ne/ d+ha me d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha mA ne/ sa mA hi te/ bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/

yongs su gzung du gsol/ yongs su bskyang du gsol/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ chad pa spong bar mdzad du gsol/ mtshon cha spong bar mdzad du gsol/ mtshams gcad par mdzad du gsol/ sa bcing bar mdzad du gsol/

ku ru ku ru paM/ mak+Shi/ bi d+hi bi d+hi bi d+hi/ mArga saM pra swa te/ a mr-i ta te dza ba ti/ gnod pa thams cad las bdag la rtag par bsrung du gsol/ /bsrung du gsol/ mu lu mu lu mu lu/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri/ ba le ba le/ ta ra ta ra/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa ni/ kha kha re/

d+hu hU~M hU~M ni/ d+hu hU~M ni/ bdag 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ dza yaM ku ru ku ru/ phu ru phu ru swA hA/ a ma le swA hA/ a mr-i te swA hA/ 'phags pa phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba'i

gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/ lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / /rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur/ /mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi/ /shes rab dkyil

'khor mang la skyabs su mchi/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma/ /'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shes/ /drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs/ /de ni spyod pa rgya chen rnams las byung / /sems can don phyir

phrin las chen po'i khur/ /spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas/ /dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin lus su bsgyur/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas/ /thugs rje'i spyan gsal 'gro ba'i mig 'byed

pa/ /dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs/ /de la lha dbang tshangs tshogs shin tu 'dud/ /byams shing bzod ldan snying rje skyed pa'i ma/ /lha mo mchog ste 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes/ /thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags/ /shes rab zab cing

shes pa'i rten byed kyang / /rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag /'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la/ /sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas/ /mu su rtog ge pa rnams kun kyang 'dud/ /yan lag rnam par 'byes

shing gsung snyan pa/ /yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings/ /rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa/ /blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa/ /mi slu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la

bzhugs/ /thugs dam brtan bcas bskul pa rnams la yang / /dpal gyis dgongs shing don kun nye bar skongs/ /'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun/ /sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te/ /phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang / /

dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab/ /gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa/ /dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can/ /lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang / /yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /byang chub mchog gi spyod

phyir su dag mos/ /bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i/ /lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la/ /bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol/ /bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang / /lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la/ /rig

pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang / /bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol/ /rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las dben/ /snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod/ /mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par bri 'dod ltar/ /mtshan nyid rtogs dka'

yon tan gting mtha' med/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma ni/ na maHswa ra swa t+yai de bi sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pA daM brah+mA nu man+t+ra swA hA/ dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shrI ma hA de bi byA ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo

dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad

sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang /

'jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig

tu 'dug go/ /lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang mgo bos

phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su bskor te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis

bstod cing bsngags so/ /lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'am/

blon po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal kyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod

pa 'di 'chang na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang g.yo can dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/

nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang bang pa thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so legs so/ /legs lags te/ gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang phan yon ni de dag lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal

gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ban de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho baiDUr+ya dang / gser

gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par

'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa

dang / nor dang 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod bar byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs

par byed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa tsan+dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo

rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi tog gi dpal

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od

tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te/ bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed par

'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te/ lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang

pad+ma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha mo chen mo dpal gyi

ming rnam par nyon cig /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ lha thams cad kyi ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/ lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad

yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dpal/ 'jig

rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo/ /oM nyi ma'i bu mo'am/ yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal/ bkra shis ma/ sems can gyi ma/ rgyal ma/ rnam par rgyal ma/ gang gA ma/ mu stegs thams cad ma/ bkra

shis thams cad ma/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ rgyags byed ma/ zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i dpal/ gza' thams cad kyi dpal/ seng ge la zhon ma/ pad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/ pad+ma/ pad+ma las byung ma/ pad+ma la

gnas ma/ pad+ma 'dzin ma/ pad+ma dang ldan ma/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba dum dang ldan ma/ nor sbyin ma/ dkar mo dkar mo chen mo/ /lag dkar ma/ bkra shis thams cad 'dzin ma/ bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/ shes nyen can gyi bu mo/

lag pa 'bum ldan ma/ mig 'bum ldan ma/ mgo 'bum ldan ma/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/ gzugs bzang ma/ kun gyi gzugs can ma/ grags ma/ shin tu grags ma/ zhi ma/ sprin 'dra ba'i skra gtsang ma/ zla ba ltar mdzes ma/ dge ma/ dge byed ma/

sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ 'phags ma me tog gi dpal me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang / mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ chu dang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i

dpal/ sman dang / rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / nor dang 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyin ma/ zas dang skom sbyin ma/ 'od gsal ma/ snang ma/ lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/

gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin byed ma/ longs spyod ma/ gzi brjid ma/ gzi brjid ldan ma/ phun sum tshogs ma/ 'byor pa ma/ rnam par 'phel ma/ mthong ma/ chos kyi dpal ma/ khyab 'jug la rten ma/ ku mu da la

gnas ma/ gnod sbyin ma/ bzod sbyin ma/ mthu rtsal gyi gnas ma/ dag byed dang bkra shis thams cad kyi lag ldan ma/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jigs byed ma/ bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal/ sa thams cad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags

'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal/ bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang /

sbyin sreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/ 'od ldan ma/ mchog dga' ma/ skal bas 'gyur ma/ drang srong thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal/ bud med thams cad kyi gnas kun gyi gtso mo dpal gyi mchog /mi'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams

cad kyi dpal gyi mchog /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/ yid 'ong ma/ sim byed ma/ lus ngan la sdug ma/ chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/ oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig /thar bar mdzod cig /bsod nams kyi

tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swA hA/ oM gang ga sarba ti R+tha mu khe swA hA/ oM sarba bid tre swA hA/ sarba maM ga la d+hA ra NI swA hA/ tsa tu ra ba de sarba nak+Sha tra/ grA hA ga /nA hA ga / nA d+hA mU rta ye swA hA/ prah+mA ya swA hA/ biSh+Na be swA hA/ rudrA ya swA hA/ bi shwa mu khA ya swA hA/

oM gri ni gri na sarba kar+ya sA d+ha ni/ si ni si ni/ A bA hA/ de ba hA/ bai shra ma nA ya swA hA/ su bar+Na/ d+ha na d+ha n+ya/ A kaR+ShaN+yai swA hA/ sarba puN+yA A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/ shrI he ba te A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/ sarba pA pa na sha mai swA hA/ sarba a la k+Sh+mI pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ye swA hA/

sarba de ba ta a b+hi mu kha shri ye A yuR+ba la par+Na ke ra ye swA hA/ sarba bid twa maM ga la ha stA ya swA hA/ siM ha ba ha na nai swA hA/ pad+ma saM b+hU ta ye swA hA/ sarba kr-id ti ka kho rda ba ni sha mai swA hA/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi

ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ dpal dang bde ba dang / skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsan+dan gyi bdug pa phul te bklags na des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/

bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur/ de'i dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo'i dpal de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan

pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA lak+Sh+mi NI sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na

bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig

tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de ma yin pa

gzhan yang rung ste/ gang gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de ni dbul ba bor te phyug por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan ma/ bkra shis ma/ pad+ma'i phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo/ dkar mo/ grags pa chen mo/ pad+ma'i spyan/ 'od chen mo/ byed pa mo/ zas sbyin ma/ rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/ dpal chen mo/ s+yAd ya the daM/

dzi ni/ g+h+ri ni/ sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni/ sha shi ni/ a lak+Sh+mi ni/ me nA sha ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa dAHswA hA/ a b+h+r-i ku TI pa ra ma su b+ha ge swA hA/ lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /skal ba bzang po dang ldan

par 'gyur ro/ /'byor pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad par byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa dang /

bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag

'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ sems can gang su yang rung bas dpal chen

mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis shes te/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / rjod par yang byed na de dbul po spangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/ /dpal lha mo chen mo'i

ming bcu gnyis ni 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ma/ dpal ldan ma/ pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma/ nor bdag ma/ dkar sham ma/ grags chen ma/ pad+ma spyan mnga' ma/ 'od chen ma/ byed pa mo/ zas sbyin ma/ rin chen 'od ldan ma/ dpal chen

mo ma/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ dzi ni/ g+h+ri Ni/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad ma/ si mi si mi/ ni mi ni mi/

bdag gi mi shes pa thams cad bsal bar mdzod cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o//

dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a gra bid+yA man+t+ra/

bod skad du/ mchog thob pa'i rig sngags/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dung can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed pa/ gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa/ longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa/ dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa/ 'khor 'phel bar

byed pa/ tshe 'phel bar byed pa/ dgra zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs zhi bar byed pa'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa phul la/ sems byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM

shad+khi ni de bi ta A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ tiSh+Tha d+ha ne d+ha na dza ye/ brI brI br-I d+d+hi ka ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri/ d+h+r-i ti ka rI nA na/ bi bi d+yA be sha bsta/ A yur+d+ha ra Ni yu yu/ A yuSh+bA la ni ta thA ga tA sma ra bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ma tI laM bo da ra/ de hi me bar na shad+bi ni swA hA/ bdag dge ba 'di nyid kyis sprul pa'i sku 'di

nyid du mthong bar gyur cig /stong pa nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur cig /stong pa nyid kyi don mthong bar gyur cig /stong pa nyid kyis don byed par gyur cig /'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs

so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA mad+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM kaM ka ni kaM

ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa raM pa rA Ni me swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i chog ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod

byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lan cig bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro/ /lus la 'chang ngam glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur

ro/ /gang zhig snying rjes non te dang bya dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na shi ste dus las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am stong ngam 'bum brjod na sems

can de sems can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang de'i mod la thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'am til lam yungs kar ram chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/ khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu bsreg pa'am/ yang na mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ rig sngags kyang bris te

mgo bo la btags na de ngan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te dus gsum du gos brje zhing kha zas

mi za ba'am yang na zas dkar bag bza' zhing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten skor bzhin du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de ngan song nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas sgrub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod pa byed cing lus kyang ston la legs

so/ /zhes bya ba yang byin nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing mchod rten 'bum byas la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang /

yang na chu klung du btang na des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la 'phags pa'i dge

'dun la yang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas 'di che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig /'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba yang

byin nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa yang rung ste 'chi kar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod

byed pa lta ci smos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur da'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra pA tA la nA ma tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi

gtsug lag khang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang / lha'i tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub

sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros thams cad pa dang / blo gros 'phel ba dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pa'i blo gros dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / kun du bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon

nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bu dang / mi thub bsrel dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu drug dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la 'di lta ste/ rab

'byor dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / 'od srung dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / glang po'i mchod rten dang / sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor cing mdun du

bdar te bzhugs so/ /gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / ci'i skyes bu dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang du chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das

kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ dri ma med pa'i blo gros khyod kyis shar phyogs kyi snang ba chen po 'di mthong ngam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros stan las langs te bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar

nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos mngon par btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /shar phyogs kyi ngos kyi snang ba shin tu chen po yongs su 'phro ba 'di 'tshal

lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i snang ba 'di ci lags/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros kyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di sus bgyis pa bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cung zad bzhad pa dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dri ma med pa'i blo gros 'dir byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang tshim pas rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing

gzhan yang lha ma yin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / 'byung po stong phrag rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir 'ong bar 'dod pa'i snang ba yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de nyid du 'khor 'dus

ba'i dkyil 'khor der phyin par gyur to/ /phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod par mkhyen nas mkhyen bzhin du dgyes

shing rangs pas yongs su dris pa/ lag na rdo rje gal te nga'i thad du cung zad gleng bar 'dod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pas gdon mi za bar rtogs par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal

pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la bltas nas/ de nas yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas ngo phab ste/ cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar

'khod par gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rig pa'i rgyal po dpag tu med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'khor thams cad spro ba'i sems su gyur pas cang mi smra bar 'khod kyis smros shig smros shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
